Und dann ist er so ängstlich wegen der Zukunft, dass er die Gegenwart nicht genießt; das Resultat ist, dass er nicht in der Gegenwart lebt; er lebt, als würde er nie sterben, und dann stirbt er und hat nie wirklich gelebt.“Zitat , Dalai Lama Vielen Dank im Voraus für Ihre Unterstützung und bis bald.Das Nabani Team _____________________________________________________ Texto en Espanol Centro de sanación y bienestar holístico " Nabani ' "Hola, soy Thomas de Alemania. Estoy viviendo en el bello México desde hace 12 años y soy uno de los principales creadores de este proyecto;Un centro holístico de sanación y bienestar con el nombre "Nabani "(que significa "estar vivo" en el idioma nativo local Zapoteco) en el estado de Oaxaca, México. Esperamos abrir las puertas de nuestro proyecto en los próximos meses a todos los que busquen la curación holística o un momento de bienestar.El proyectoEstamos ahora creando un lugar donde puedes aprender, leer o simplemente relajarte en un buen ambiente, sin preocupaciones. Las ideas centrales de Nabani 'son:-alimentación consciente, promovemos el vegetarianismo y obtenemos una parte clave de nuestra comida de nuestro propio huerto orgánico-Permacultura, vida sustentable-Tratamiento con plantas medicinales, aceites esenciales y Aroma Touch masaje-Movimiento físico a través de disciplinas como Yoga y Kung Fu-Desprogramacion Mental-Limpieza enérgica a través del Temazcal (Baño Tradicional Prehispanico Maya ), Respiración Holotrópica y ReikiTambién somos muy afortunados de contar con el apoyo de un chamán clarividente del pueblo que tiene muchos años de experiencia en la cirugía paranormal. Es un experto en la curación de personas con diferentes enfermedades e incluso en algunos casos ha curado enfermedades que aparentemente eran incurables.La Región de Oaxaca es una parte única en el mundo donde el conocimiento antiguo de la cultura Maya y Azteca, el Temazcal, el Chamanismo , la sanación con plantas medicinales y las ceremonías curativas como la de hongos mágicos  y otros tratamientos de esta forma son más comunes e incluso normales para crear una mejor salud .La esencia de Nabani 'Nuestro objetivo principal es poder ofrecer un espacio donde pueda desaprender muchas de las creencias que le han causado dolor y malestar, y durante todo este proceso obtener las herramientas necesarias para que pueda mantener su propio bienestar físico y emocional. Hacemos esto a través de nuestras creencias básicas al comer conscientemente y cuidar nuestros estados físicos, emocionales y espirituales. Se familiarizarán con la raíz emocional de su conflicto (la enfermedad o los problemas cotidianos), y así aprenderán a eliminarlos nuevamente.En resumen, aprenderá a curarse a sí mismo, a limpiar su mente y a abrirse a nuevas creencias. Tal estado no solo es esencial para todos, sino también para contribuir a la creación de una nueva sociedad con más habitantes libres y saludables.Apoyo a la comunidadEstamos situados en un pequeño pueblo cerca de Oaxaca, en el bonito valle. La gente aquí es muy cálida y natural. Y en los últimos años hemos hecho muchos amigos aquí. Es como una gran familia.Todos los conocimientos y ideas que tenemos los compartimos siempre de forma gratuita con los amigos locales y las personas interesadas que nos acogen. Entre esos:- Auto-sanación, mental y enérgicamente- Permacultura y vida sostentable,- Creando huertos, plantas medicinales,- Ciencia nutricional, buena Alimentacion con buen Agua- Enseñanza de idiomas, reciclaje- Movimientos corporales como yoga y kung fu-Enseñarmos como jugar con juegos de madera didácticos ( Hechos del Nabani Team ) a los niños de la comunidad.También queremos crear más lugares de trabajo en el proyecto y comenzar talleres en arte y música.Para Crear otra idea de vida feliz para estar satisfecho consigo mismo y con la naturaleza.Donde estamosEl proyecto avanza a buen ritmo. Actualmente estamos construyendo alojamientos para visitantes a través de conceptos ecológicos, donde esperamos ofrecer espacio para hasta 8 personas. Estamos en las etapas finales de Terminar un Superadobe y una Cabaña de madera con techo verde.También hemos estado trabajando siempre ampliar nuestro jardín de plantas medicinales y los huertos En los tiempos libres, elaboramos decoraciones y arte hecho de piedras preciosas y madera. En este momento estamos terminando la construcción de un Horno de Barro para Pizza y Pan . Además, planeamos construir baños secos, un temazcal hecho de tierra, una pequeña piscina natural, otra cabaña de madera, otras duchas adicionales, una expansión de nuestro jardín de plantas medicinales y una sala de Barro para que el chamán curandero pueda trabajar en un lugar de buenas condiciónes.                                 Hemos estado trabajando en este proyecto esencialmente con amigos y voluntarios provenientes de más de 15 países diferentes.La metaEn definitiva, este es un proyecto de humanos para humanos que piensan que es posible vivir una vida plena, y asi disfrutamos nuestro trabajo con esto en mente. A más largo plazo, la idea es comprar otro terreno más grande cerca de la costa oaxaqueña, lo que nos permitirá recibir más huéspedes (tener más espacio para plantas medicinales , verduras y vegetales). Nos gustaría abrir el proyecto a cualquiera que desee ofrecernos su ayuda. Hay muchas otras áreas diferentes que nos gustaría incluir (artesanía, circo, música, ...). Si quieres formar parte de nuestro trabajo, siempre estamos abiertos a la colaboración con el objetivo de hacer del mundo un lugar mejor. Hemos invertido tanto amor, sudor y sueños en Nabani ', pero con su apoyo podremos avanzar mucho más con este proyecto.¡Te estamos esperando con el corazon y brazos abiertos .¿Por qué estamos haciendo esta campaña indiegogo? El proyecto está yendo bien, pero aún tenemos que seguir adelante.En realidad, necesitamos donaciones para poder continuar.Entonces, para esto necesitamos las donaciones:Terminar la construcción de la última cabaña de madera con forma natural, terminando nuestro temazcal, la pequeña piscina natural y el área de curación / terapia.                                              También necesitamos más materiales para poder fabricar muebles para las cabañas, los paneles solares, los calentadores solares, los baños secos y otra ducha para el Temazcal al aire libre.                                Al final, si las donaciones son suficientes, también necesitaríamos un pequeño autobús para que lo podermos recocher                                       y llevar los a los hermosos lugares y la maravillosa naturaleza que nos rodea.  Hierve el Aqua  Monte Alban Lago de montana Teitipac En Términos de números:Terminando el Temazcal                                           1000, -DollarCabaña de madera con Ducha y Bano seco         2200, - DollarPiscina natural con cascada de aqua                     2000, -DollarPequeño autobús                                                        1800, - DólarÁrea de yoga y materiales, plantas                        300, - DólarDucha exterior para Temascal                                 300, - Dólar2 paneles solares para las 3 cabanas                    1000, - DólarMadera para los muebles                                          600, - DollarTerminando el área para cirugía paranormal / Terapias          800, - Dólar Por sus donaciones y ayuda serás parte de este proyecto especial, también ayudarás a la gente aquí de las comunidades y a las personas que nos rodean a recibir más información y curaciones gratuitas. Esto simplemente va a cambiar sus vidas y cuando compartan esta experiencia con otros, y ellos también con más, en poco tiempo la buena frecuencia se propaga , como un virus positivo."Debido a que el hombre sacrifica su salud para ganar dinero, sacrifica luego todo el dinero para recuperar su salud". Y luego está tan ansioso por el futuro que no disfruta el presente; el resultado es que él no vive en el presente o en el futuro; vive como si nunca fuera a morir, y luego muere sin haber vivido realmente ". - El Dalai LamaEstán todo invitados a seguirnos en nuestra página de Facebook," Nabani Healing Center" para ver la evolución del proyecto y ver la implementación de las construcciones finales.https://www.facebook.com/NabaniHealingCenter/Muchas Gracias de antemano por su apoyo, y hasta pronto.El equipo de "Nabani"

story:
Short Summary

 

Hello, My name is DJ Thielen, CEO  / Entrepreneur / Ex-Professional Athlete / Motivational Speaker / Influencer.  I hope you enjoy my story and mission to have an Academy VIA an App for our  "LIFE AFTER SPORTS -Success Academy" where we will provide:

1.  Mentorship from Celebrities and Professional Athletes both current and past.

2. Personal Development from some of the BEST Personal Development Trainers in the World.

3.  A 24-7 Crisis help line for people suffering from PTSD, Depression, Drugs, and Alcohol Addiction.

4.  "TEAM" Video Conference Calls Every WEEK With Mindset, Business, Success, And A NEW Topic Each Week To Inspire / Educate / And Motivate.

5. A Step By Step Training Module System on HOW TO : Set A NEW Vision For Their Lives / Manifest Good Things  /  Be Happy Consistently / Re-Wire The Brain For Success After Sports /  Create Their Own Successful Business / Be Part Of A Team Again And Network & Community Overcoming The Same Challenges (Very Important) / Have Accountability Partners / Create A NEW And Amazing Successful Life / Testimonials & Success Updates Continuously To Inspire & Give Hope.....And Much More!      

How good would that feel to be part of something that impacts Millions of ex-athletes be able to feel confident again and have a mission, purpose, and amazing life after sports?

You see, growing up I always dreamed of being a "Professional Baseball Player" and in 1991 I was fortunate to fulfill that dream when I was drafted by the San Francisco Giants in the 6th round of the Major League Baseball draft when I was only 19 years old.  Not understanding how important the Mental Side of the game was I had tremendous highs and incredible lows and ended up leaving the game in 1996 going from Top Prospect to working in a warehouse for minimum wage.

I felt defeated like a total failure and I didn't want to be around old friends or go to places I grew up.  I felt lost, alone, frustrated, mad, and constantly wondered what if!  I had NO education to fall back on and it didn't matter anyways because my ADD didn't particularly allow me to like school very much:).  Year by year things got better and I realized the same things that were important to be a HIGHLY SUCCESSFUL ATHLETE were the same things that would lead me to success in the Real World. I saw that Being consistent, being positive, expecting good things,  continuously getting better, having a mentor, personally developing, and outworking my competition would allow me to be successful in this NEW WORLD and even though I had NO degree and wasn't the most talented I could still "Make it".  The only thing was this took me 20 plus years to really understand because I had to figure these things all out on my own.

I can look back and see that had I known what I know now I could have achieved MASSIVE success in 1 year as opposed to 20 and I want to share these "Secret Success Hacks" with others that have left sports, feel lost, and want success after sports BUT don't know where to turn.  

I recently heard of a good friend of mine that was a high round baseball draft pick and committed suicide. I was shook up over this as I heard he just never got over not making it to the Major Leagues so I dove in and what I uncovered is an untalked about MASSIVE EPIDEMIC. I learned there are MILLIONS of people that leave sports and are suffering from drug addiction, alcohol addiction, PTSD, suicidal thoughts, depression, and just feel stuck and I felt a massive pulling on my heart to create an Academy that will SOLVE THIS PROBELM FOR THEM Instantly saving lives, changing peoples destiny's, and helping them have SUCCESS after sports immediately became my mission.

As a contributor and giver to this cause, YOU will be helping athletes from ALL AROUND THE WORLD be able to not get addicted to drugs, not become an alcoholic, not have PTSD....BUT rather immediately plug into a Community of support, personal development, business training, mentoring from Professional Athletes and Celebrities, and be able to create a life of Success rather than Failure. 

How good would that feel to be part of something that impacts Millions of ex-athletes be able to feel confident again and have a mission, purpose, and amazing life after sports?

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

"WHAT WE NEED"

We are striving to Raise at least $2,000,000 so that we can have 20 Celebrities/Current Athletes/ And Famous Entrepreneurs Part of the Training Academy and Community.  For every $100,000 we raise we will be able to pay to have Celebrity part of the Academy.  The more Athletes and Celebrities we can have the bigger the impact on Members to feel loved and gain insight from people they see on TV, RESPECT, AND ADMIRE. 

 

"WHAT YOU GET"

There will be AMAZING perks for those that Give To This Cause at various levels including T-Shirts, Signed Memorabilia, Celebrity Dinner and LIVE Meet and Greet, and Much More. You can see these details in the Campaign details. EVEN IF WE DON'T REACH OUR GOAL (and we are confident we can with YOUR HELP) we will still launch the Academy at the HIGHEST level we can and the show will go on and be a Massive Success that will change the path of MANY peoples lives for the better.  Even with 10 or 15 Celebrities and Pro-Athletes it will be a Blessing and massively impactful!!!!

 

The Impact

 

I'm sure we all know people that have went down a dark road with drugs and alcohol OR experience PTSD, Depression, and suicidal thoughts.  What if you could have showed them something to where they didn't have to go down that road....do you know how much pain that would have saved them and their Families?

This Epidemic is 100% preventable AND we have the solution with our Life After Sports SUCCES ACADEMY.  By giving to this cause you are helping us to touch, impact, and literally change people's destiny that have lost hope, given up, and feel lost and alone. 

Being able to help others be Successful is what led me to write 2 National Best Sellers, One with Shark Tanks Kevin Harrington and Lorel Langemeir called "Get In The Game".  Building and Scaling businesses is what myself and my business partner have excelled at and we will put the same work, effort, sweat and hard work to ensure that every Academy Member feels the love and know that now these people have a solution to live a positive life filled with NEW and amazing possibilities, new friendships, and lifelong support from Celebrities and Athletes fro around the World!

 

Equipped To Handle Challenges

 

Due to the fact that we have built an Academy for another Industry that has been WILDLY SUCCESFUL we already have the Platform, tools, and knowledge to handle the growth and scaling 100%. By using the #1 communication app in the World SLACK we can enroll and Unlimited amount of people, provide the training , provide the support, and touch as many people as possible with our format...ITS AMAZING.  By Creating Modules (Recorded Webinars and Videos), and having a directory its like an ONLINE Training Academy with ongoing Personal Development , weekly mastermind video conferences, and LIVE crisis operators that will Transform peoples lives in a very short amount of time and allow ongoing support and mentorship that's so valuable.

 

NO Money To Give....That's OK.....PLEASE SHARE:)

Please share this Cause and Mission VIA the INDIEGOGO share tools on your Social Media, Text, and Email and Thank You So Very Much!

 

Warm Regards,

DJ Thielen

story:
About Jasmine and SHAKTIBARRE

I am Jasmine McCarthy, one of SHAKTIBARRE's founding teachers, and would love your support in raising $9,600 to open my own accessible, sustainable yoga-barre empowerment hub – this time in further south into Brooklyn! For all the students who've been asking in class and over Instagram/email/text what I mean by "further south into Brooklyn," I'm currently in lease negotiations for an awesome spot in Dumbo. By the way, this will be SHAKTIBARRE's 3rd location and I'm thrilled to next-level partner with them.

I want to continue championing diversity within boutique fitness, achieve a greater level of professional and financial autonomy so that I may soon start a family, and relentlessly emphasize movement as a tool that helps many find their voice where it is otherwise silenced. Having grown with SHAKTIBARRE for 24 months, I can't think of a better organization to partner with in the name of inclusivity, women's rights, and exercise.

[Teaching at SHAKTIBARRE WILLIAMSBURG on a Friday morning]

Since joining SHAKTIBARRE in December of 2016 after my now-husband pointed me to it (and then I took tons of classes, one day virtually auditioning myself by providing a barre playlist to Liz when the internet was down), my leadership skills have accelerated in these ways:

  • Brought in and taught nearly 16% of SHAKTIBARRE's total clientele (for perspective, that's the 2nd highest on the whole team!)
  • Maintained a 4.8/5 star rating across 1590 reviews
  • Successfully continued my 7 year role as Manager of Downtown Dance Factory
  • Excelled in every interview and deliverable necessary to co-own a SHAKTIBARRE studio

By building a SHAKTIBARRE in South Brooklyn, I will also extend my partner organization's 29 month reputation of offering exceptional barre and yoga classes at sliding-scale prices – a mission that already brought accessible movement to over 10,000 students in Williamsburg and Harlem, increased said impact globally via 35 press hits, and won awards such as Brooklyn Magazine's Top 100 Culture Influencers and 9 Impressive Women in Fitness Making an Impact in the Industry (SELF, 2017). 

[My co-founders Corinne Wainer and Shauny Lamba at the Healthy Living Awards]

Where does the $9,600 specifically go?

  • $9,600 is the 20% capital I need to secure a $38,400 small business loan
  • $9,600 + $38,400 = $48,000, which secures me 40% ownership of SHAKTIBARRE South Brooklyn
  • My $48,000 will be met with a $72,000 investment from SHAKTIBARRE's co-founders
  • With $120,000 total (exact startup costs to open a location), I'll be able to open my SHAKTIBARRE

In full transparency always, I'm also well-aware as a half African-American and half European woman that, "Over 80% of venture capitalists in the US are men," and of the 1% who are Black and female, my chances of securing funding outside of this Indiegogo/investment from my co-founders model have already proven slim to none: "Startups founded by women, for example, received just 2% of VC funding in 2017."

 

[Getting real about small business funding]

Feeling confident about your contribution

Over 10 years of fitness-management experience (Downtown Dance Studio being one of them), running my own beauty and wellness business on the side as a Younique affiliate, and being one of SHAKTIBARRE's most successful Master Teachers all helped me to confidently take the leap into owning a studio. Additionally, these are some extra confidence-boosters that help you and I both feel strongly about SHAKTIBARRE #3's favorable outcome:  

  • With my co-founders investing $72,000 in my studio, we also have an Operating Agreement where they're responsible for mentoring me, building out barre and yoga trainings (read: additional streams of revenue for SHAKTIBARRE South Brooklyn to keep class prices affordable to all), and we're all liable for location #3. Also, they've done this twice before (; 
  • As an owner of the studio, I have full authority to hire my own Manager, his/her assistant, and team of stellar teachers and work-study ambassadors. In fact, I've already begun the interview process for some of these roles and am focused on hiring a talented, dedicated, and reliable team to complement my track record of leadership. Did you know SHAKTIBARRE employs up to 25 people per studio? It's exciting to think about creating more jobs for women like me, too!
  • If I don't meet my goal, I'll put 100% in an escrow account until I can save the money (keep in mind this will take me an estimated 18 months, which means students who've been inquiring about a SHAKTIBARRE in South Brooklyn will have to wait even longer for affordable, sustainable workout classes and an irreplaceable community with which to experience them).

[High-fiving after class with students / fans of SHAKTIBARRE #3]

Thanking you with all my heart!

For more private reasons I can go into another day, I can't stress the importance of helping women – including myself – to find our voices. Movement has always been a tool for me to step into that power, articulation, and bravery we all deserve safety around and access to. Best believe you me, opening my own SHAKTIBARRE and fundraising $9,600 with your help go well beyond what I ever thought I could ask for myself. 

To show my appreciation to you, I've thoughtfully designed perks for each level of your giving:

  • $20 = shout-out in the SHAKTIBARRE newsletter to over 8,000 subscribers
  • $50 = a SHAKTIBARRE core ball for your workouts
  • $100 = a 30-minute SHAKTIHIIT video for exercising in your home
  • $500 = all of the above perks, plus free lip gloss and my post-workout beauty guide
  • $1200 = 2 online personal training sessions with me and 1 individualized wellness plan (sound nutrition, breaking habits, energy balancing, and sensual liberation) for 2019 made by my co-founders

Thank you, thank you, thank you! I'll leave you with more words of gratitude from one of my students as we embark on this journey toward SHAKTIBARRE South Brooklyn together!

"Ughhhhh, this place is simply THE BEST. Ive yet to have anything negative to say – only I wish it were closer to me or my job. Every instructor Ive had has been so insanely welcoming, positive and encouraging without overdoing it or being corny. Jasmine was great today and I really enjoyed the longer format class. I sweat a ton and felt so proud of myself after! I also finally felt the confidence and comfort to workout just in a sports bra. For someone who has struggled with body image issues their whole life, this is HUGE and a testament to the fact that these classes will not only make you sweat so much that you have to, but that the community is so accepting and welcoming you no matter what your size or fitness level is." 

[Using yoga-barre to free ourselves of formerly feeling excluded, not daring to dream big, and staying quiet about things that matter... during exercise and beyond... RAAAWR!]​

I want to continue championing diversity within boutique fitness, achieve a greater level of professional and financial autonomy so that I may soon start a family, and relentlessly emphasize movement as a tool that helps many find their voice where it is otherwise silenced. Having grown with SHAKTIBARRE for 24 months, I can't think of a better organization to partner with in the name of inclusivity, women's rights, and exercise.

[Teaching at SHAKTIBARRE WILLIAMSBURG on a Friday morning]
Since joining SHAKTIBARRE in December of 2016 after my now-husband pointed me to it (and then I took tons of classes, one day virtually auditioning myself by providing a barre playlist to Liz when the internet was down), my leadership skills have accelerated in these ways:

Brought in and taught nearly 16% of SHAKTIBARRE's total clientele (for perspective, that's the 2nd highest on the whole team!)
Maintained a 4.8/5 star rating across 1590 reviews
Successfully continued my 7 year role as Manager of Downtown Dance Factory
Excelled in every interview and deliverable necessary to co-own a SHAKTIBARRE studio

By building a SHAKTIBARRE in South Brooklyn, I will also extend my partner organization's 29 month reputation of offering exceptional barre and yoga classes at sliding-scale prices – a mission that already brought accessible movement to over 10,000 students in Williamsburg and Harlem, increased said impact globally via 35 press hits, and won awards such as Brooklyn Magazine's Top 100 Culture Influencers and 9 Impressive Women in Fitness Making an Impact in the Industry (SELF, 2017). 


[My co-founders Corinne Wainer and Shauny Lamba at the Healthy Living Awards]
Where does the $9,600 specifically go?

$9,600 is the 20% capital I need to secure a $38,400 small business loan
$9,600 + $38,400 = $48,000, which secures me 40% ownership of SHAKTIBARRE South Brooklyn
My $48,000 will be met with a $72,000 investment from SHAKTIBARRE's co-founders
With $120,000 total (exact startup costs to open a location), I'll be able to open my SHAKTIBARRE

In full transparency always, I'm also well-aware as a half African-American and half European woman that, "Over 80% of venture capitalists in the US are men," and of the 1% who are Black and female, my chances of securing funding outside of this Indiegogo/investment from my co-founders model have already proven slim to none: "Startups founded by women, for example, received just 2% of VC funding in 2017."

 

[Getting real about small business funding]

Feeling confident about your contribution
Over 10 years of fitness-management experience (Downtown Dance Studio being one of them), running my own beauty and wellness business on the side as a Younique affiliate, and being one of SHAKTIBARRE's most successful Master Teachers all helped me to confidently take the leap into owning a studio. Additionally, these are some extra confidence-boosters that help you and I both feel strongly about SHAKTIBARRE #3's favorable outcome:  

With my co-founders investing $72,000 in my studio, we also have an Operating Agreement where they're responsible for mentoring me, building out barre and yoga trainings (read: additional streams of revenue for SHAKTIBARRE South Brooklyn to keep class prices affordable to all), and we're all liable for location #3. Also, they've done this twice before (; 
As an owner of the studio, I have full authority to hire my own Manager, his/her assistant, and team of stellar teachers and work-study ambassadors. In fact, I've already begun the interview process for some of these roles and am focused on hiring a talented, dedicated, and reliable team to complement my track record of leadership. Did you know SHAKTIBARRE employs up to 25 people per studio? It's exciting to think about creating more jobs for women like me, too!
If I don't meet my goal, I'll put 100% in an escrow account until I can save the money (keep in mind this will take me an estimated 18 months, which means students who've been inquiring about a SHAKTIBARRE in South Brooklyn will have to wait even longer for affordable, sustainable workout classes and an irreplaceable community with which to experience them).


[High-fiving after class with students / fans of SHAKTIBARRE #3]
Thanking you with all my heart!
For more private reasons I can go into another day, I can't stress the importance of helping women – including myself – to find our voices. Movement has always been a tool for me to step into that power, articulation, and bravery we all deserve safety around and access to. Best believe you me, opening my own SHAKTIBARRE and fundraising $9,600 with your help go well beyond what I ever thought I could ask for myself. 
To show my appreciation to you, I've thoughtfully designed perks for each level of your giving:

$20 = shout-out in the SHAKTIBARRE newsletter to over 8,000 subscribers
$50 = a SHAKTIBARRE core ball for your workouts
$100 = a 30-minute SHAKTIHIIT video for exercising in your home
$500 = all of the above perks, plus free lip gloss and my post-workout beauty guide

$1200 = 2 online personal training sessions with me and 1 individualized wellness plan (sound nutrition, breaking habits, energy balancing, and sensual liberation) for 2019 made by my co-founders

Thank you, thank you, thank you! I'll leave you with more words of gratitude from one of my students as we embark on this journey toward SHAKTIBARRE South Brooklyn together!
"Ughhhhh, this place is simply THE BEST. Ive yet to have anything negative to say – only I wish it were closer to me or my job. Every instructor Ive had has been so insanely welcoming, positive and encouraging without overdoing it or being corny. Jasmine was great today and I really enjoyed the longer format class. I sweat a ton and felt so proud of myself after! I also finally felt the confidence and comfort to workout just in a sports bra. For someone who has struggled with body image issues their whole life, this is HUGE and a testament to the fact that these classes will not only make you sweat so much that you have to, but that the community is so accepting and welcoming you no matter what your size or fitness level is." 

[Using yoga-barre to free ourselves of formerly feeling excluded, not daring to dream big, and staying quiet about things that matter... during exercise and beyond... RAAAWR!]​

story:
A Movement of BLOOMERS

Currently we are moving towards the tipping point, where more of us are beginning to remember our connection to the natural world and our essential goodness.  We are arriving on the planet with multiple and seemingly divergent gifts at a time when the technologies with which to communicate these gifts are pervasive. Increasingly too, we have begun to make bold choices to pursue these diverse and seemingly discordant passions with authenticity. In so doing, we are challenging the ways we identify ourselves, do business, create art, build communities, organize politically, love, parent and spend our time.

BLOOM is a movement of people who are seeking to live more authentic lives as we deliver unique and urgently needed gifts to world. We are global citizens who are finding innovative ways of responding to the evolutionary changes of our time for their own survival.

We are:

  • Creative and Social Entrepreneurs
  • People who are juggling jobs as they create their own enterprises.
  • We are people with stressful careers who are seeking to reinvent and bring balance to the way they live and work.

I have written a book for us, so that together we can keep ourselves well and growing, as we deliver some amazing gifts to the planet.

This book seeks to inform, inspire and celebrate this movement, as too often we are delivering our gifts at the expense of the things that matter most: our well-being, close relationships, community, family and fun.

 

New Thinking

Much of this book is new thinking emerging from ancient truths and refined for modern ears. 

In this book, the five elements:  MINERAL, NATURE, FIRE, WATER & EARTH -- the elements that support all living things – are used as metaphors:

  • to give us a language we can ALL understand,
  • to help us discover the things that make us BLOOM
  • it is a language we can use to support each other on as we journey.

In this book, they are used to help us discover.

  1. The 5 LIFE NUTRIENTS - the pillars of spiritual and psychological health that keep us well and growing.
  2. The 5 LIFE AREAS in which ALL human beings have activities that provides a new paradigm of life balance.
  3. 25 NEW PERSONALITY ARCHETYPES that will help us better understand how our best qualities become our shadows when stressed and how to keep ourselves evolving.
  4. THE FIVE DRAGON FEARS that keep us stuck and how to identify and confront the ones to that keep us stuck.

 

What You Will Learn

Through stories, insight inducing exercises and processes you will learn:

  1. How to listen more closely for your OWN voice
  2. How to negotiate change that threatens your identity or self concept
  3. How to see more clearly your light and your shadows and be more authentic and available to others.
  4. How to better understand the nature of conflict, and how to use it deepen relationships
  5. How to feel more at home in your own body and move forward more confidently in the world.

     

    Are you a BLOOMER? (Take this test!)

    • ARE YOU NEEDING TO TAKE THE NEXT STEP but, not knowing how and without a clear path ahead, you face-off with of SELF-DOUBT and CONFUSION?
    • ARE WANTING TO MAKE A CHANGE but right now you toggle between FEELING STUCK on the one hand, and BEING NO LONGER IN CONTROL, on the other?
    • YOU MUST NOW BE VISIBLE FOR THE THINGS YOU BELIVE IN, but you fear, that folks will not buy it, or get you for that matter?
    • DO YOU NEED A TEAM but are wary of the feelings of  ABANDONMENT or BETRAYAL that comes with conflict and departure?
    • DO YOU DESIRE TO HAVE IT ALL but have you ever wondered, how will you manage it all?  

    If you can relate to any of this, you are a BLOOMER too!

    It is a balancing act, where what's a stake is:

    • Our HEALTH and WELL BEING on one hand, and on the other,
    • The special gifts that we each carry for the planet.

     

    Join the Movement TODAY!

    Currently the book is being edited and illustrated by a wonderful team. Our goal is to raise $5,000. 

    Your support of this project will be used to design and print 1000 copies of the book, an e-book and an audio book. In turn you help others to BLOOM!  

    THIS IS OUR TIME TO BLOOM!

     

    What happens when we hit our crowdfunding goal? 

    Once the printing and digitizing are funded, we will start production of the Essence Cards as a stand alone deck of cards with instructions. These cards for now will be included in this book.  This will make it easier for you to share the new personality archetypes with your family, friends and co-workers. 

     

    Testimonials

    "There are good coaches out there who respond to "How do I get what I want?"  Olu's work awakens us to the fulfillment of a greater, ascending form of attainment.  His words activate the answers that already reside in each of us to a much more purposeful question: 'What is Life asking of me?' This book is an answer to a collective sacred prayer.  It holds gifts that we need, right now." ~ Kinshasa Carvalho 

     “Olubode is the twenty-first century go-to person for artists who want to realize their creative possibility. As a composer and creator of digital content for film, television, recording, and the Internet, whenever I am faced with a problem that I don’t understand, I rely on him to listen intently and to ask the questions that get me moving. He is a powerful mix of creativity, business, and spirituality. His counsel has helped me to move forward boldly, and continuously.” ~ Patrick Gandy, Composer, Los Angeles California

    “The Essential Journey was my path to personal and professional transformation, healing, and purposeful life mapping. This process of self discovery and renewal helped me to find my true voice and essential self in a meaningful dance of light and shadow, by boldly facing and faithfully embracing all parts of myself – my essence and my desires- in ways that empowered, ennobled, and energized my dreams, goals, and desires for myself and the world around me. It was simply a mystical experience.” ~ Tyrone Fitzgerald ~ Attorney-at-Law

     “This Journey has been incredibly fruitful for me. Writing felt like rest — my desk actually became a place of rest and simplicity. I have never ever experienced anything like that. This program is tough; it’s a lot to think about. But I feel it was really critical to getting my work done and doing it in a way that I can imagine doing for a lifetime — I can imagine actually having a partner and a family because my work doesn’t have to make my life chaotic.” ~ TF, Writer & College Professor

     “This program has given me the tools to keep myself clear, focused and productive.  It was well worth the time spent.” ~ Malcolm-Jamal Warner – Actor/Director

    “For those of us who are often overwhelmed by professional and personal responsibilities, Olubode’s system is a godsend. It helped me define the real priorities in my life and organize my workday accordingly.” ~ Lisa Jones – Author/Screenwriter

    ‪”Olubode‪’s work on passion projects and finding your essence really inspires me. One workshop with him and the lessons have lasted a lifetime. After 10 years, I still refer to the booklet on Essences… cant wait for your book to come out!”  ~ Andrea Dempster Chung – CEO Go Global

     

    About the Author

    Olubode Shawn Brown was born in Jamaica where he spent the first formative years of his life until young adulthood. He grew up in Jamaica’s churches. As young man who knew that he was gay, he was completely surrounded by fixed, religious and cultural ideas of what was right and what was wrong. Yet from a young age has been in search of “unseen things.”  After graduating from law school he left Jamaica for the United States and has since worked as an attorney, corporate consultant, artist-advisor and life coach in Los Angeles and New York City.

    A year after arriving in New York City the AIDS epidemic hit like a slowly exploding bomb, and “many of the young men who had become my brothers began to die. The trauma of it all shook me to the core. All my worlds fell apart. America had become a nightmare.”            

    This launched him on a journey to recapture faith and to find what really matters.  

    On this journey, with many teachers and guides, he has experienced a series of profound insights that have radically changed his life. He works now as an artist, facilitator, and guide, devoted to celebrating the freedom of these insights and sharing his journey with others.

    His work synergizes and reflects the timeless wisdom of the Dagara people of West Africa and the Vedic seers of India, fused with the distinctions of transformational courses, emotional intelligence and the teachings of great metaphysicians of our time. His simple distillation of these truths uses the elements of mineral, nature, fire, water, and earth as metaphors to help reveal an exciting new paradigm of life balance, to help us each understand our unique inner pathways to personal growth, and the urgency of delivering of our life’s gifts. 

    Olubode lives in New York City where he produces events, media and travel experiences that introduce his core philosophy to a global audience.  He is the founder and facilitator of a global community called BLOOM.

story:
About Paula

Paula Castro is our beautiful 7 years-old daughter. When she was 3 months old she had strong convulsions that left her with cerebral damage and was later diagnosed with cerebral palsy.

We knew our lives would change radically; Paula didn’t act or behave as other kids her same age. She was aggressive, didn't respond to her name and just wanted to be alone. She began preschool when she was 4 and her differences with other kids became more evident; we knew that something was wrong and we suspected it was something additional to cerebral palsy; Paula had a lot of difficulty following instructions and was unable to stay still. In school they didn't know how to help Paula and as her mom, I often found myself telling teachers what and how to deal with her, even though she had a shadow teacher.  Doctors suggested that in addition to suffering from cerebral palsy, Paula was autistic.

Paula's Education

In our desperation we discovered Monarch, a therapeutical-educational institution that works with children with neurological disorders. Monarch had demonstrated success with other children like Paula.  I understood that to enable Paula to have a more regular life in which whe could learn how to relate to others and have the possibility of eventually adapting to society, she had to attend Monarch. My family and I decided to pour our savings and make the extraordinary effort to gather the resources for Paula to attend  this institution. We gathered  enough for her first year’s therapies.   

I am confident that we made the right decision. We have seen great improvements in Paula as a result of the intensive therapies she receives in Monarch: she now can look me straight in the eye and call me "Mommy". She can express when she is hungry or cold. As time passes her crisis are shorter and farther apart. We can now take her out on errands without fearing a crisis from the multiple stimulus she receives from common noise and lights. Our hearts are now filled with joy and our family life has changed dramatically. Monarch has deeply changed our lives.

Help Us

The joy and happiness that comes with a newborn child turned into fear after paula was diagnosed; fear of her always being dependant of her parents and of caregivers. We feared she would depend on us even for the easiest activities. She has already started to develop the tools and abilities she needs that will allow her to become less dependent of others. We need your help so Paula can continue to receive her therapies, which have an annual cost of $9,000.  We have invested all of our family’s savings for her to attend Monarch for one year. We know there is no other choice for our daughter and with the help of the people that understands our story, we can make this happen.

We thank all the good hearts that have decided to be part of our story and help us to help Paula develop the tools she will need to have a more happy, independent and meaningful life.

 

 

Acerca de Paula

Paula Marcela Castro Balcarcel es nuestra hermosa hija de 7 años. A los 3 meses de edad, después de una convulsión que la dejó con el hemisferio izquierdo afectado, fue diagnosticada con parálisis cerebral leve.

A partir de ese momento supimos que nuestra vida cambiaría radicalmente; Paula no se mostraba igual que otros niños de su edad: no respondía a su nombre, solamente quería estar aislada y era un poco agresiva.  A los 4 años cuando inició el preescolar y estas diferencias eran cada vez más evidentes; sabíamos que algo no estaba bien, sospechábamos que había algo más que parálisis. Paula tenía mucha dificultad para seguir instrucciones, no podía estar quieta y aprendía de forma y a un ritmo diferente.

Nos sugirieron que Paula, además de la parálisis cerebral, presentaba conductas de un niño dentro del espectro autista. La situación en su colegio cada vez era más frustrante, pues no sabían cómo tratar a Paula y era yo la encargada de decirles qué hacer y cómo hacerlo a pesar de haber tenido maestra sombra.

La educación de Paula

Cuando nos enteramos del enfoque terapéutico-educativo de Colegio Monarch y del éxito que han tenido otros niños y jóvenes que han sido atendido allí, mi familia y yo decidimos hacer esfuerzos extraordinarios para que Paula pudiera asistir a esa institución. Logramos reunir lo suficiente para su primer año.  

Desde que Paula está en Monarch, hemos visto cambios notorios,  ya me dice “mami” viéndome a los ojos, puede expresar cuando tiene hambre  y frío, cada vez controla un poco mejor sus crisis, y estamos convencidos que sin el apoyo que recibe en Monarch, no hubiéramos observado estos avances tan pronto.  Son cosas que nos llenan de alegría pues pensamos todo esto estaba muy lejos, si no imposible, de suceder.  Monarch nos ha cambiado la vida a todos.

Ayúdanos

Con el nacimiento de un hijo, se tiene grandes expectativas y en nuestro caso conservamos el temor de que siempre van a necesitar de nosotros incluso para las actividades más sencillas, sino desarrolla las herramientas y destrezas que la hagan una niña tan independiente como sea posible.  Es por eso que necesitamos su ayuda, Paula necesita apoyo para que pueda continuar recibiendo la apoyo terapéutico-educativo que recibe en Monarch; sabemos que no hay otra opción para nuestra hija  y solo con la ayuda de personas que se sensibilizan ante nuestra historia, podremos hacer  esto realidad.

Agradecemos desde ya a todos aquellos buenos corazones que decidan ser parte de nuestra historia y ayudarnos a que Paulita logre obtener todas las herramientas para tener una vida más independiente y feliz.

We thank all the good hearts that have decided to be part of our story and help us to help Paula develop the tools she will need to have a more happy, independent and meaningful life.
 
 
Acerca de Paula
Paula Marcela Castro Balcarcel es nuestra hermosa hija de 7 años. A los 3 meses de edad, después de una convulsión que la dejó con el hemisferio izquierdo afectado, fue diagnosticada con parálisis cerebral leve.
A partir de ese momento supimos que nuestra vida cambiaría radicalmente; Paula no se mostraba igual que otros niños de su edad: no respondía a su nombre, solamente quería estar aislada y era un poco agresiva.  A los 4 años cuando inició el preescolar y estas diferencias eran cada vez más evidentes; sabíamos que algo no estaba bien, sospechábamos que había algo más que parálisis. Paula tenía mucha dificultad para seguir instrucciones, no podía estar quieta y aprendía de forma y a un ritmo diferente.
Nos sugirieron que Paula, además de la parálisis cerebral, presentaba conductas de un niño dentro del espectro autista. La situación en su colegio cada vez era más frustrante, pues no sabían cómo tratar a Paula y era yo la encargada de decirles qué hacer y cómo hacerlo a pesar de haber tenido maestra sombra.
La educación de Paula
Cuando nos enteramos del enfoque terapéutico-educativo de Colegio Monarch y del éxito que han tenido otros niños y jóvenes que han sido atendido allí, mi familia y yo decidimos hacer esfuerzos extraordinarios para que Paula pudiera asistir a esa institución. Logramos reunir lo suficiente para su primer año.  
Desde que Paula está en Monarch, hemos visto cambios notorios,  ya me dice “mami” viéndome a los ojos, puede expresar cuando tiene hambre  y frío, cada vez controla un poco mejor sus crisis, y estamos convencidos que sin el apoyo que recibe en Monarch, no hubiéramos observado estos avances tan pronto.  Son cosas que nos llenan de alegría pues pensamos todo esto estaba muy lejos, si no imposible, de suceder.  Monarch nos ha cambiado la vida a todos.
Ayúdanos
Con el nacimiento de un hijo, se tiene grandes expectativas y en nuestro caso conservamos el temor de que siempre van a necesitar de nosotros incluso para las actividades más sencillas, sino desarrolla las herramientas y destrezas que la hagan una niña tan independiente como sea posible.  Es por eso que necesitamos su ayuda, Paula necesita apoyo para que pueda continuar recibiendo la apoyo terapéutico-educativo que recibe en Monarch; sabemos que no hay otra opción para nuestra hija  y solo con la ayuda de personas que se sensibilizan ante nuestra historia, podremos hacer  esto realidad.
Agradecemos desde ya a todos aquellos buenos corazones que decidan ser parte de nuestra historia y ayudarnos a que Paulita logre obtener todas las herramientas para tener una vida más independiente y feliz.

story:
Who We Are

We are five students at The University of Tennessee who are raising money to sponsor children to attend the YWCA’s Summer Kids in Play program. The YWCA Knoxville, a 501(c)3 local non-profit organization, was founded in 1899 with the mission of “eliminating racism, empowering women and promoting peace, justice, freedom and dignity for all.” The YWCA has many programs to end racism and better the greater Knoxville youth; one of these ways is through their SKIP program.

 

 

The Project

YWCA’s Summer Kids in Play, or SKIP, is a summer program that offers a safe and fun place for kids between the ages of 5-14 to learn valuable skills and to develop their character. During the program, kids take swimming classes, cooking classes, complete summer reading challenges, and more. This summer program is great for busy parents, and for those who want their kids to continue learning in an exciting and educational environment.

 

The price for each child to go to camp for one week is $85. Many families, however, cannot afford to send their kids to SKIP, so our goal is to raise $1,300 to help them out. With your donations, we will be able to send 15 kids to a week of this summer program.

 

 

How It Helps

By attending this program, the lives of these children are not only enriched, but it also benefits these families as it allows their parents to work and provide for their families. Parents are also ensured that their children are well taken care of during this program. In addition, the community is benefited by a better educated future generation. By donating, children get the chance to learn and develop in a supporting environment that they would otherwise not have exposure to.

 

 

How Else You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is able to donate financially. For those who would like to help in other ways, we ask that you share our campaign page with family, friends and coworkers in person, or on social media to help spread the word. Further, sharing the YWCA Knoxville Facebook page will help our campaign. You can also visit their website to learn more ways in which you can help!

All photos are courtesy of YWCA Knoxville

story:
SAT NAM!

Thank you for visiting our fundraiser page.  My name is Brianne.  I am a Mother, a Healer, a Kundalini Yoga Teacher, Advocate for Social Justice and I have a VISION for  something very powerful and impactful to serve low income underserved communities in the Los Angeles area. 

With your support we are  launching the MOTHERSHIP:

SCHOOL BUS TRANSFORMED INTO A SUPERFLY SPIRITUAL URBAN LIGHTHOUSE taken into LOW INCOME UNDERSERVED COMMUNITIES BRINGING HEALING through yoga,meditation, massage, acupuncture, gong baths,  life coaching, Real nutrition, Doula care, creative arts, music and movement for deep healing and transformation to reach one's highest potential...

We are doing this fundraiser to BUY THE BUS and transform it by painting the shell with a vibrant mural and rennovating the inside to reflect a peaceful beautiful healing space for the work to take place. The bus will be used as a mobile "clinic". We will be taking the bus out several times per week offering our free services to families and children in low income underserved communities in Los Angeles. 

Low Income underserved communities need these services MORE  than anywhere else in this city.  We will not stop until there is access for all.  "Siri" tells me there are 15 yoga studios and 15 massage shops all within 1/2 mile of my house.  In that case, we strive to have 15 buses going out daily where it is most needed! No one is left behing in the Aquarian Age.

 

The MOTHERSHIP is ready to set sail and we need your help.

We found a bus that is perfect to get us started for only $2,300!!!  The awesome owner Kris could have gotten cash for it that afternoon but he believed in our cause and worked out a deal with us.  BUT WE NEED TO RAISE THE FUNDS!

$6000 is the fundraising total. The additional contributions will get us up and running.

$300 Smog Check/Tune Up

$300 DMV registration

$100 Oil Change

$1100 1 year auto insurance 

$1000 for bus mural and interior renovation (making it superfly and blissed out)

$900  1/2 year of gas

If we go well over our asking $6000 for our bare bones launch to something like $21,290, we will be well on our way to obtain a nonprofit 501(c)(3) status and operating in a much more expansive way. Not only will we be covering all of our bus expenses like gas, maintenance and insurance but we will be able provide more elaborate outreach and develop more relationships with programs that could use our services.  Have monies to pay for incentives, hold community events and have the resources to do a little more of all that we do to serve.

IT'S DEEP YA'LL but I can't write the book here.  Appetizer for ya.

My professional and personal life have always been interconnected because it is my deepest desire to bring healing and tools for transformation to those who would not otherwise have access.  This is who I am and how it has always been....  A burning desire to bridge barriers, advocate for the voiceless and most importantly, guide people into their power, their own sense of self.

  It is not by coincidence that I met my best friend, Tisha Marina, who shares the same birthday with me 2/12.  It is by no coincidence that we both share this burning desire.  Since we met 14 years ago we knew we were bound for profound work in service for those who were underserved and at risk...especially our youth.   Over the past 14 years we have gained professional and life experience that has prepared us for today and prepared us for this mission.  We have met likeminded folks along the way who are part of our tribe to share their gifts and expertise to bring everybody on this ride into the Aquarian age. We do not want to see people left behind in this most incredible time in our history.  As  healers, teachers, social justice advocates, artists and leaders, our goal is to shine the light, teach the techniques so those at risk can have a backpack full of tools to reach their highest potential, moving into the world rather than sitting on the sidelines. The time is now.

 

Our work focuses on serving at risk youth and their families.  Our team is filled with experts and teachers able to provide a cradle to college, life sustaining model, keeping a continuance of support through life in a connected family feel community. 

 

THE IMPACT of this mission is priceless in that it is life giving and life supporting to folks who would not otherwise receive the experiences like these to transform their lives. We are so grateful for your support in this mission. Thank you.  The time is now.

story:
Helping to prevent SIDS

Every since I first learned of SIDS as a young girl, with the hopes of becoming a mother one day myself, I wanted to know why there had not been more done in the fight against SIDS. As I got older I realized that there were people who were doing just that. Furthermore, I realized that didn't preclude me from attempting to make an effort to be a contributor in the quest to prevent SIDS.  With all that is being done, so far, there is still approximately six percent of babies born will lose their lives to SIDS/SUDS.

The Rain/Element Blanket came into existence after my own daughter experienced a hypothermia event. Had I not had the presence of mind to remove her wet clothes and began to dry and massage her, it frightens me to think of what could have happened. There is research confirming that we must seek "prevention of neonatal hypothermia is essential newborn care."

We need your help

  • Obtain Good Housekeeping Seal of Approval 
  • Purchasing licensing from Disney for the use of their Disney characters
  • National advertising in all forms of media
  • Hire professional advertising personnel
  • Purchasing prime-time TV, Internet and magazine ad spots

The Impact

We have the ability, with your help, to get the word out of this protection. We will better able to educate parents of the potential threats and the protection that the Rain/Element Blanket offers

Risks & Challenges

Every day that we delay in bringing this product to market, that increase the risk of a child losing their life. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share our information with everyone your friends, families, co-worker, acquaintances or anyone else!

story:
Roda je prerasla Čanićevu

Iako je naše "gnijezdo" u Čanićevoj ulici 14 koje smo svijale od 2005. godine, prelijep, ugodan i svima nama drag prostor, on je već godinama premalen za redoviti programski i administrativni rad udruge koja zapošljava u ovom trenutku 13 osoba, te za edukacije i radionice koje provodimo.

Rodino gnijezdo je dom brojnim Rodinim radionicama za roditelje. Mnogi od vas su se upravo na tim radionicama upoznali s našim radom te znate da je za njihovo održavanje lista čekanja duga, a prostor u Čanićevoj premalen.

Često se istodobno daje telefonska izjava za radio, snima se izjava za televiziju, piše se izvještaj donatorima, odvija se sastanak te se vode razgovori s roditeljima koji su došli zatražiti naš savjet ili pomoć. Sve to koči daljnji razvoj Rode i otežava rad naše udruge.

Stoga smo tražile i preko Javnog natječaja Grada Zagreba za dodjelu gradskih prostora udrugama dobile na korištenje prostor u Žerjavićevoj ulici broj 10 u Zagrebu, koji je veličinom (187 m2) primjeren potrebama i planovima razvoja udruge Rode.

 

Žerjavićeva - Novo Rodino gnijezdo

U naš novi, prostrani prostor ipak ne možemo useliti odmah. On treba uređenje i prilagodbu svim funkcijama koje smo mu namijenile. Tek po uređenju, koje očekujemo do kraja godine, moći ćemo potpuno preseliti naš ured i poslovanje. Kao i većina prostora koji se preko natječaja dodjeljuju udrugama, i ovaj zahtijeva financijska ulaganja, ali i značajnu volontersku pomoć u čišćenju i uređenju. 

Novi prostor će nam omogućiti:

  • Imat ćemo kapaciteta za češće radionice u kojima možemo uključiti veći broj roditelja
  • Organizacija događanja vezanih uz rad Udruge - tribine, projekcije, edukacije,...
  • Mogućnost održavanja radionica i seminara Rodi srodnih udruga
  • Imat ćemo mjesta ostvariti projekte kao što je Babywearing Library za koje prije nismo imale mjesta
  • Imat ćemo mjesta za veću biblioteku roditeljstva iz koje zainteresirani mogu slobodno posuđivati knjige

...i još mnogo drugih korisnih, RODAstih akcija :)

 

Što nam treba:

Ukoliko smo vam ikada pomogle korisnim savjetom ili pravodobnom informacijom, ukoliko ste članica ili volonterka Rode, ili pak neke druge organizacije civilnog društva, zainteresirani građanin, građanka ili pravna osoba, pozivamo vas da nam financijski pomognete odabirom "perka" (perks su pobrojani s desne strane) ili uplatom donacije. 

Potreban je veliki iznos kako bismo uredile prostor. Kod uređenja prostora trudit ćemo se zadržati i obnoviti većinu namještaja koji smo u prostoru zatekle, i zbog ekonomičnosti i zbog što poštednijeg utjecaja na okoliš. Također, iskoristit ćemo i sav postojeći namještaj iz postojećeg prostora. Kroz ovu kampanju se nadamo sakupiti 8000$ kako bismo prostor doveli na razinu useljivosti do kraja godine.

Sredstva za adaptaciju prostora te prilagodbu prostora za rad s roditeljima prikupljat ćemo kroz: 

  • Indiegogo kampanju
  • donacije pojedinaca i tvrtki
  • natječaje za udruge u kojima ćemo dio sredstava budžetirati za opremanje prostora.

Građevinski zahvati sa sobom donose rizik da će se prilikom izvedbe planiranih promjena dogoditi situacije kao što su nepredviđeni troškovi, odgoda radova i slično. Za takve situacije smo odredili dio planiranog budgeta, a ukoliko bude potrebna veća cifra, obavjestit ćemo vas o problematici i isplanirati potrebne dodatne akcije.

 

Kako možete pomoći?

Pozivamo vas da nam pomognete donacijama. Mnoge i mnogi od vas koji ste sudjelovali na našim edukacijama, čitali naše brošure, dolazili na preglede sjedalica ili rješavali probleme u dojenju uz savjetnice za dojenje ili gledajući naš DVD Mliječna staza, pitali ste nas kako se odužiti, možete li nam pomoći. 

Sudjelovati u uređenju novog gnijezda možete i kroz:

  • Donaciju u radovima i opremi (pošaljite nam e-mail na roda@roda.hr )
  • Odaberite neki od perkova - izabrale smo za svakoga ponešto, a ukoliko želite kombinirati perkove na svoj način, javite nam se na roda@roda.hr pa ćemo se dogovoriti :)
  • Proširite informacije o ovoj kampanji među svojim prijateljima i poznanicima​
  • Podijelite našu kampanju na svojim društvenim mrežama pomoću opcija za share koje se nalaze na vrhu ove stranice
  • Puno bi nam značio i vaš komentar te ga slobodno napišite u dio za komentare na dnu stranice

...sve navedeno nam je od velike pomoći!


Važno! Roda neće primiti donaciju od proizvođača i distributera proizvoda iz djelokruga Međunarodnog pravilnika o marketingu nadomjestaka za majčino mlijeko. Takve donacije, ako ih bude, bit će vraćene donatoru. Zahvaljujemo na razumijevanju.

O povijesti kampanje bojkota Nestléovih proizvoda možete pročitati na našem webu. 

 

Mi smo Roditelji u akciji – RODA, skupina zainteresiranih građanki i građana koja se zauzima za dostojanstvenu trudnoću, roditeljstvo i djetinjstvo u Hrvatskoj. I imamo još puno posla...

Hvala što ste uz nas! <3

Indiegogo kampanju
donacije pojedinaca i tvrtki
natječaje za udruge u kojima ćemo dio sredstava budžetirati za opremanje prostora.
Građevinski zahvati sa sobom donose rizik da će se prilikom izvedbe planiranih promjena dogoditi situacije kao što su nepredviđeni troškovi, odgoda radova i slično. Za takve situacije smo odredili dio planiranog budgeta, a ukoliko bude potrebna veća cifra, obavjestit ćemo vas o problematici i isplanirati potrebne dodatne akcije. Kako možete pomoći?Pozivamo vas da nam pomognete donacijama. Mnoge i mnogi od vas koji ste sudjelovali na našim edukacijama, čitali naše brošure, dolazili na preglede sjedalica ili rješavali probleme u dojenju uz savjetnice za dojenje ili gledajući naš DVD Mliječna staza, pitali ste nas kako se odužiti, možete li nam pomoći. Sudjelovati u uređenju novog gnijezda možete i kroz:
Donaciju u radovima i opremi (pošaljite nam e-mail na roda@roda.hr )
Odaberite neki od perkova - izabrale smo za svakoga ponešto, a ukoliko želite kombinirati perkove na svoj način, javite nam se na roda@roda.hr pa ćemo se dogovoriti :)
Proširite informacije o ovoj kampanji među svojim prijateljima i poznanicima​
Podijelite našu kampanju na svojim društvenim mrežama pomoću opcija za share koje se nalaze na vrhu ove stranice

Puno bi nam značio i vaš komentar te ga slobodno napišite u dio za komentare na dnu stranice
...sve navedeno nam je od velike pomoći! Važno! Roda neće primiti donaciju od proizvođača i distributera proizvoda iz djelokruga Međunarodnog pravilnika o marketingu nadomjestaka za majčino mlijeko. Takve donacije, ako ih bude, bit će vraćene donatoru. Zahvaljujemo na razumijevanju.O povijesti kampanje bojkota Nestléovih proizvoda možete pročitati na našem webu.  Mi smo Roditelji u akciji – RODA, skupina zainteresiranih građanki i građana koja se zauzima za dostojanstvenu trudnoću, roditeljstvo i djetinjstvo u Hrvatskoj. I imamo još puno posla...Hvala što ste uz nas! <3

story:
Our Blessed and Divine Reunion

     Ordinarily, we wouldn’t post anything like this but we are currently living in such extraordinary times that Lahilah and I come to all of you and ask sincerely from our hearts to yours, for assistance in raising the airfare for a plane ticket so I may fly back to the “Enchanted Land” of England to be with my Love for the rest of my days.

     Greetings everyone, my name is Roger Sylver; former FM and on line radio personality. Our story begins three years ago when I was co-hosting an internet radio show. In so doing, Lahilah and I met through a mutual good friend (to whom we are forever indebted) of the radio show.

     During the first weekend of June 2011, the wonderful opportunity arose for me to visit Ms. Lahilah in England (after we had discussed our true feelings for one another, of course). After acquiring everything needed for my trip, I was up and off to the “Land of Enchantment” in mid October of 2012 until mid January of 2013.

     Those (fast) three months made us both realize how connected we are with one another spiritually, through many lifetimes past. After over a month of being separated and in our own countries (I being from America), we’re very aware as to how much we are meant to be together. With that, M’Lady Lahilah would like to say a few words:

     “Greetings All, Lah Here!! Thank You for All for caring enough to hear our story, firstly, from a perspective of harsh learning’s through both of our lives guiding us both to meet one another in these times.

     I feel we can benefit man & womankind by sharing our experiences and ways of healing when dealing with difficulties thrown at us in this huge transitional time. We wish to be a team in assisting to inspire and nourish the hearts, minds, and souls of others, moving forward in grounding ways to empower self sufficiency on all levels; adding to that, two hugely aching hearts healing and beating as One in LOVE!

     We would love to create SO many more memories (as seen in our picture slide video). Please, will you assist us with “Our Blessed and Divine Reunion”?

     Blessings this day to One and All of You.

     ~Lahilah”

     Thank You All for your time & energies and please partake of our special video. And please remember, any and all assistance (including MUCH promotion of this fundraiser) is & will be greatly appreciated.

     Humbly yours,
     ~Roger & Lahilah

     (Donations also being accepted via PayPal: highlanderrsc@gmail.com)

Some pictures:

     Lahilah: “This is the first doodle I’ve done in an age!...Mother Earth protected by White Spiritual Wings, One Heart Beat &, One Love that Roger and I extend out to the whole of humankind!! We have waited a very long time to step forward in these moments!!!



    
     Lahilah: “The Heart on my forehead right over my third eye is like nothing I’ve ever seen before! Roger and I were on a wonderful magical walk where our energies had been restored by Mother Earth! What do you feel?” (Below are a few blowups of the picture Lahilah speaks about, all unaltered aside from magnification.)









Perks For You AND Us!!!

     We are entering (at fast pace) a new form of the Divine Feminine Energy, the Solar Feminine, where all life is honored, valued and celebrated.  Embracing feminine values is not only a more conscious and loving way to live but a NECESSITY.

     Venus, the symbol of Love and the Divine Feminine, is now in front of the Sun which has been traditionally viewed as masculine.

     Roger and I uniting together for Good, will enable us to focus on grounding these energies. We will keep you updated through pictures and/or video of our unfolding paths, avenues & happenings as they progress.

     BEST YET...We’re ALL venturing into these amazing new times!! TOGEHTER, we can bring these new energies into being with LOVE as centre stage!!!

story:
Hi!

Thanks so much for taking the time to look at my Indiegogo campaign!

I have been teaching yoga in community classes and personalized sessions since 1998 and have offered cultural arts immersions and yoga retreats since 1988.
The impetus that energizes both of these branches of work for me could be described by the word ‘authenticity’. 

When I began practicing yoga and thought about teaching, it was so important to me that I do so in such a way that inspired the sense of ‘being’ yoga. This has blossomed to mean something like engaging root philosophical ideas within a physical yoga format, and supporting people in meeting  every aspect of inquiry and practice with a fresh, intelligent quality of mind.

Upon much reflection I recognize that skillfully blending technology and some online platforms to the way I work will really make a difference in how consistent, sustainable, and effective this work/heart offering can be.

Being Yoga with Trishna wants to meet with private clients in person, and to be able to provide a streaming and/or video option for when we cannot meet in person or for when it is their optimal choice. I will provide dedicated support with personalized yoga, private or group sessions via livestream, and videos designed just for them (You!)which will be available for 30 days at a time.

The tools needed for this expansion also happens to be the same ones necessary to manage my website and my Inner Adventure Travel projects, and to begin to thoroughly document these unique and meaningful yoga retreats and cultural arts immersions.

The following tools are needed:

Dell XPS 15 laptop, including a 2 year warranty, tech support, taxes, and a protective case.                                             $2,363.00

Canon M50 camera, including tax and warranty
$710.10  

Related necessary gear: (microphone, lavalier microphone, tripod and memory cards).
$302.58

The Total cost for these much needed tools is
$3,375.68

Supporting this campaign will
>help the ideas mentioned above come to life!
> help a woman/artist to sustain and grow her business/creative vision.
>make my support for authentic experience of practice that is Being Yoga with Trishna  more available.
>help document and share teachings and experiences of the yoga retreats and cultural arts immersions that are Inner Adventure Travel.

This Indiegogo campaign will be followed by the creation of a subscription/membership offering on Patreon which along with my website will act as hub for my work as a yoga teacher and healing arts practitioner.

My site is being updated (Thank you Meagan Healy!) to support this subscription based offering, and continue to be a resource for connection to classes, retreats, workshops, and immersions.
This new laptop will help me to keep this wonderful site current and functional.

Perks

⭐️ $1.- 19. My deep gratitude for giving what you can!

⭐️ $20.-89. Attend a drop-in class in Sausalito Monday or Wednesday at 5:30 p.m. 

⭐️$90. Three live-streamed classes *healing/therapeutic, *gentle flow, and *flow. Each will be available one week after the live class for contributors who could not attend live.

⭐️ $100. A personalized yoga video, like a private that you can work with for a month! This includes a 15 minute interview and a 45 minute class, on video.

⭐️ $200. Six months of basic membership to Being Yoga with Trishna A basic membership provides 3 videos of guided practice and teaching each month. It offers access to occasional live streamed classes, and first option on early bird rates for retreats and workshops. Please understand that it will be up and running after the necessary tools are acquired, and I will be so grateful for your feedback and participation as this vision is in it’s beginning time!

⭐️ $300. One year of basic membership to Being Yoga with Trishna A basic membership provides 3 videos of guided practice and teaching each month. It offers access to occasional live streamed classes, and first option on early bird rates for retreats and workshops. Please understand that it will be up and running after the necessary tools are acquired, and I will be so grateful for your feedback and participation as this vision is in it’s beginning time!

⭐️$1000. Yoga at your weekend event, up to four sessions of  grounding meditative yoga classes for your wedding gathering, staff retreat, or family reunion. 

All of the above perks are combine-able!

I have never done an Indiegogo or any other type of crowdfunding campaign before. I am hopeful that a collectively funded grant for my business could be 100%  successful and also understand that the outcome may not match the total requested.

If it is only partially met, I will designate the resources towards my business needs in this order:

>The laptop (This is such a crucial tool for managing a website, creating posters and all forms of promotion, communication, etc..).

>The camera 

>The gear

And if the funds raised go beyond the request I will add:

>Teachers Insurance.
>business cards, posters, promo.
>A wilderness First Aid  training.

Thank you!

story:
I hope to raise $5,000 to pay most of the printing costs for a book that includes many full-color spreads of my visual art in addition to all of the writings. I would love to print 500 books and get them into the hands of cancer survivors and others who could benefit from my story.
 

A huge lesson for me in living with cancer has been how amazing people are, how so many want to help others. The outpourings of love and concern that I've experienced have been a huge part of my ongoing healing. I've learned how interdependent we are and how important it is to accept help.

The road has been rocky, yet I’ve found amazing help, comfort, and support along the way -- from my circle of loved ones, from the medical community, from the creative process of telling my story. We all have a story to tell, and living with cancer and its treatments has focused mine in unexpected ways.

I’m asking your help in realizing my dream of publishing “‘My Handmade Life’ and sharing it with others who walk their own daunting paths. I wrote and painted the book to help myself through my struggles, yet as I was putting it all together, I realized my story might encourage others to find their own best ways to cope with health challenges and with life's many setbacks.

In my writings, I've expressed my fears, my grief, my spiritual longings, my regrets, but also the unexpected infusion of light and hope that would shine through the creative act of writing. I also painted images of my experiences, with the same unexpected "flip" into a better mental-emotional-spiritual state. These creative outpourings have been a lifeline and have helped me live amazingly well in the face of catastrophic illness. The assembled writings and paintings have become a book I've titled My Handmade Life, a metaphorical patchwork quilt composed of essays, letters, fairytales, paintings, and creative magic.

This very human story, if shared, could touch others, offer comfort, hope, and reassurance that they are not alone. We are partnering with two remarkable organizations whose work I value highly from personal experience: the Celilo Cancer Center in The Dalles, OR, and the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society (the Oregon-Southwest Washington-Idaho-Montana Chapter). With kindness, care, and high-level expertise, they serve so many people who are living with cancer. 

It feels important to get the book into the hands of those who could benefit, and these organizations will make that happen. If you’d like to help with this, please contribute a book to the Celilo Cancer Center or the Leukemia & Lymphoma Society through our "donation" perks.

The Celilo Cancer Center offers medical and radiation oncology, a breast center, integrated therapies, alternative therapies, and support services. For more information on these services, go to https://www.mcmc.net/our-services/cancer-care/. 

The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society funds cutting-edge blood cancer research and patient advocacy and provides information support resources for patients and their families, including co-pay assistance, travel assistance, urgent-need funds, nutrition plan assistance, peer-to-peer support, and direct contact with specialists. For more information on these services click on https://www.lls.org/support-resources 

It has taken 13 years for the book to be written, painted, assembled into a meaningful whole, and professionally edited and designed. Its design is so beautiful, I can't wait for you to hold the book in your hands! I have persisted with this project despite relapsing cancer, six rounds of chemotherapy, and a nasty bout of hepatitis. My physical health is always a factor, yet I am so grateful for an incredible team of talented people who will bring the book into the world. And with your help, we can get My Handmade Life printed and widely distributed -- to you, to your loved ones who might benefit, to cancer survivors. I’d be grateful if you would also expand the campaign by sharing these emails with friends and family who might want to participate. 

 

Thank you for all you have done to help me through my cancer years and for all you're doing to help make this dream a reality. I am so grateful for all of you!

story:
Dear Friends, 

Greetings and welcome to my campaign page.  I am a 32-year-old English, Social Studies, and Creative Writing instructor.  I have studied Buddhist meditation and yoga for 12 years.

In my spiritual traditions, it is recommended to complete an extended practice retreat at some point in one’s life.  I’ve aspired to do a long meditation retreat ever since I first began these studies.  Now, I have decided to take the opportunity to do just that.

I plan to enter a 7-month solitary meditation retreat in a cabin in southern Oregon.  I will be living in a simple room with wood heat and a camping stove, located in the mountains near Ashland, Oregon.

Why would I want to do this?

So far, meditation has helped bring greater clarity, kindness, and open-heartedness to my everyday activities.  When I meditate, I am more gentle with myself and others, less judgmental, and more aware of the consequences of my actions. I hope to bring the positive states of mind cultivated in my retreat to the classrooms in which I will teach. 

During the seven months, I will be in silence, eating simple meals between sitting and walking meditation periods.  I plan to continue my studies of Buddhist philosophy, Tibetan language, and yoga asana. I will be guided by my first and longest teachers, Lama Pema Clarke and Lama Yeshe Parke of Kagyu Sukha Chöling in Ashland.  

My retreat will cost $10,000. I have saved enough to cover half of the expenses.  I am trying to raise $5,000 more to cover food, water, health insurance, and teacher donations during my 7 months in the cabin. 

If you are inspired to make a donation, please know that every sponsorship, large or small, makes a difference. Even just $5 or $10 can be significant when made by many.

My fundraising deadline is June 23rd.  Thank you for considering my campaign.

Sincerely Yours,

Devon Ward-Thommes

 

“Genuine progress occurs when the individual not only sees some results in achieving higher levels of meditative states but also when their meditation has at least some influence on how they interact with others, some impact from that meditation in their daily life — more patience, less irritation, more compassion. That’s productive meditation. Something that can bring benefit to others in some way.”

- H.H. Dalai Lama
