story:
A few things you should know about our company:

  • we believe KNOWLEDGE should be universal, especially in the health sector;
  • we believe in COOPERATION as sharing information and connecting with different professionals is the path toward the future;
  • we believe in a holistic approach BEYOND the concept of DUALISM: standardization vs personalization, of mind vs heart, of science vs art - there is room for all here;
  • we want to create the most EFFICIENT results possible.

It is our dream to CHANGE THE WORLD OF HEALTH THROUGH SHARING AND CONNECTING.

 

What you should know about us:

We are a multidisciplinary, multifaceted team of practitioners, instructors, innovators, experimenters and programmers. We care about wellness and are working to share it through a comprehensive project that will help practitioners take their work to the next level.

Our Project

Knowlative is an Integrated Web Platform and Professional App. It will launch as an App for Holistic Health Practitioners, starting with Kinesiologists, but its goals are far more inclusive than that. Every-one of us can be part of Knowlative and benefit from it!

A Service for Health Practitioners

Knowlative is a vehicle for professional work: client records, networking, organization, statistics, and research at your fingertip. With a simple and rapid user interface, Knowlative gives you access to the best techniques available, ready to be used immediately in your client sessions.

A Showcase for your Activity

Continuous improvement is the key to personal and professional achievements and discoveries. Knowlative gives you a place to share your classes, credentials and ideas with a community of professionals. Reach out to a community of peers and support each other while also marketing your events.

A Support for Schools and Associations

Health education is the key universal well-being. Education comes from training and knowledge. Knowlative supports schools and associations to advertise courses and educational programs. With a selected audience of professionals, Knowlative offers you just the right community for your classes.

A Common Language

Have you ever read a term in a kinesiology book or heard a reference to something in a class that you didn’t understand? In order to communicate efficiently between professionals, a common language is necessary. Knowlative's blog and dictionary; procedures and techniques, can be modified and approved by the Knowlative community of professionals (like Wikipedia for kinesiologists). Knowlative is the platform for sharing and building a common path for understanding.

A New Source of Revenue

Knowlative rewards every contributor to the platform! If you have a new life-changing technique or protocol you want to share and spread to the world, you have come to the right place: add the technique to our database and be rewarded based on its use in our community.

And Much More

Knowlative's goals are wide ranging and new projects are already starting up from this platform. Gathering the data of what techniques are being used most throughout our community will allow us to publish meaningful statistics of what works for our clients internationally. Through new courses and educational projects and even to the organization of clinics, Knowlative is a brand that aims to deeply change the way we consider holistic health.

 

Help make a difference and build the future of natural health!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help in order to launch this project that will change the complementary health world. To show our appreciation for your generous support we are offering membership packages to contributors, including the opportunity to reserve yourself lifetime access to the knowledge created in our system.

The estimated costs to launch the kind of interactive software we have in mind, including initial IT and management costs is over $ 30,000. We are hoping to raise $20,000 of this through this campaign so we can get this project out to you as soon as possible.

Great perks are available too!!

As a thank-you for your support we will shout your name so everyone can hear it: it will show up on Knowlative’s website and in our Hall of Fame in our new head office. You then can choose either to receive the SPECIAL EDITION KNOWLATIVE T-SHIRT...

Or... the magnificent KNOWLATIVE HOODIE!

And, last but not least, you can receive access to one of our Operator's Packages, with Lifetime access to our platform.

 

Where is your money going?

Step 0 - Company incorporation
Main costs about this step are linked to legal and consultancy aspects of company incorporation. We already spent around €4.000 to complete this step.
Step 1 - Study the static content
There are little costs associated with this phase except some fees to our graphic consultant and  Wordpress plug-ins we need to buy. We already spent €1.000 to complete this step.
Step 2 - Add new content and Step 3 - Work in session (platform launch)
This is the most expensive step prior to lunch the platform. While we could cover costs for previous phases, here we need your help. Here is the list:
- Lawyers cost: we are going to need around € 18.000; our platform has a lot of potential, but everything we do needs to be legal and free of issues.
- Look and feel of the application (graphic consultant): €2.000;
- Marketing for application launch: to be defined, but we foresee around € 5.000 to lunch it in Europe.
TOTAL for step 2 and 3: €25.000


When step 4 - Prizegiving  is added, we expect that 30% of revenues is going to be paid as commissions to successful authors.

 

Who We Are
story_txt:
A few things you should know about our company:

we believe KNOWLEDGE should be universal, especially in the health sector;
we believe in COOPERATION as sharing information and connecting with different professionals is the path toward the future;
we believe in a holistic approach BEYOND the concept of DUALISM: standardization vs personalization, of mind vs heart, of science vs art - there is room for all here;
we want to create the most EFFICIENT results possible.

It is our dream to CHANGE THE WORLD OF HEALTH THROUGH SHARING AND CONNECTING.
 
What you should know about us:
We are a multidisciplinary, multifaceted team of practitioners, instructors, innovators, experimenters and programmers. We care about wellness and are working to share it through a comprehensive project that will help practitioners take their work to the next level.
Our Project
Knowlative is an Integrated Web Platform and Professional App. It will launch as an App for Holistic Health Practitioners, starting with Kinesiologists, but its goals are far more inclusive than that. Every-one of us can be part of Knowlative and benefit from it!
A Service for Health Practitioners
Knowlative is a vehicle for professional work: client records, networking, organization, statistics, and research at your fingertip. With a simple and rapid user interface, Knowlative gives you access to the best techniques available, ready to be used immediately in your client sessions.
A Showcase for your Activity
Continuous improvement is the key to personal and professional achievements and discoveries. Knowlative gives you a place to share your classes, credentials and ideas with a community of professionals. Reach out to a community of peers and support each other while also marketing your events.
A Support for Schools and Associations
Health education is the key universal well-being. Education comes from training and knowledge. Knowlative supports schools and associations to advertise courses and educational programs. With a selected audience of professionals, Knowlative offers you just the right community for your classes.
A Common Language
Have you ever read a term in a kinesiology book or heard a reference to something in a class that you didn’t understand? In order to communicate efficiently between professionals, a common language is necessary. Knowlative's blog and dictionary; procedures and techniques, can be modified and approved by the Knowlative community of professionals (like Wikipedia for kinesiologists). Knowlative is the platform for sharing and building a common path for understanding.
A New Source of Revenue
Knowlative rewards every contributor to the platform! If you have a new life-changing technique or protocol you want to share and spread to the world, you have come to the right place: add the technique to our database and be rewarded based on its use in our community.
And Much More
Knowlative's goals are wide ranging and new projects are already starting up from this platform. Gathering the data of what techniques are being used most throughout our community will allow us to publish meaningful statistics of what works for our clients internationally. Through new courses and educational projects and even to the organization of clinics, Knowlative is a brand that aims to deeply change the way we consider holistic health.
 
Help make a difference and build the future of natural health!
 
What We Need & What You Get
We need your help in order to launch this project that will change the complementary health world. To show our appreciation for your generous support we are offering membership packages to contributors, including the opportunity to reserve yourself lifetime access to the knowledge created in our system.
The estimated costs to launch the kind of interactive software we have in mind, including initial IT and management costs is over $ 30,000. We are hoping to raise $20,000 of this through this campaign so we can get this project out to you as soon as possible.
Great perks are available too!!
As a thank-you for your support we will shout your name so everyone can hear it: it will show up on Knowlative’s website and in our Hall of Fame in our new head office. You then can choose either to receive the SPECIAL EDITION KNOWLATIVE T-SHIRT...

Or... the magnificent KNOWLATIVE HOODIE!

And, last but not least, you can receive access to one of our Operator's Packages, with Lifetime access to our platform.
 
Where is your money going?
Step 0 - Company incorporationMain costs about this step are linked to legal and consultancy aspects of company incorporation. We already spent around €4.000 to complete this step.Step 1 - Study the static contentThere are little costs associated with this phase except some fees to our graphic consultant and  Wordpress plug-ins we need to buy. We already spent €1.000 to complete this step.Step 2 - Add new content and Step 3 - Work in session (platform launch)This is the most expensive step prior to lunch the platform. While we could cover costs for previous phases, here we need your help. Here is the list:- Lawyers cost: we are going to need around € 18.000; our platform has a lot of potential, but everything we do needs to be legal and free of issues.- Look and feel of the application (graphic consultant): €2.000;- Marketing for application launch: to be defined, but we foresee around € 5.000 to lunch it in Europe.TOTAL for step 2 and 3: €25.000
When step 4 - Prizegiving  is added, we expect that 30% of revenues is going to be paid as commissions to successful authors.
 
Who We Are

story:
STILLNESS OVER STRESS. WHY IS THIS SPACE IMPORTANT?

According to the American Psychological Association, chronic stress is linked to the six leading causes of death: heart disease, cancer, lung ailments, accidents, cirrhosis of the liver and suicide. And more than 75 percent of all physician office visits are for stress-related ailments and complaints.

58% of Americans say work is a significant source of stress (APA, 2017)

Main sources of work stress (ComPsych, 2016)

Workload, 36%

People issues, 31%

Work-life balance, 20%

Job security, 8%

Other, 5%

Millennials experience more depression at work than any other generation (BDA, 2013, MMPI, 2017)

As it relates to technology...(APA, 2017)

1 in 5 Americans say tech is a major source of stress

43% of American identify as "constant checkers"

Workers experiencing a recent organizational change are 4x more likely to report experiencing physical health symptoms at work (APA, 2017)

Occupational stress costs U.S. employers an estimated $300 billion annually through absenteeism, illness, and productivity (APA, 2017)

Companies in the Financial Times Stock Exchange 100 index that prioritize employee engagement and well-being outperform the rest of the FTSE 100 by 10% (Workwell FTSE 100, 2014)

 

WHAT ARE WE TRYING TO CREATE?

We are trying to create a sacred space, in which all people, especially women and people of color, feel safe nurtured and encouraged to work through the physical, mental and emotional challenges of their daily lives in order to experience mind, body, spirit health and energetic balance. 

Our space will provide movement meditation classes, sound healing, women's circles, ceremonial gatherings and educational workshops in our main room. And various forms of energetic healing, guidance, therapy and alternative medicine in our three back private rooms. There will also be a retail aspect of the space which will house crystals, books, meditation tools, and sound healing instruments in the front entrance.  

 

WHO ARE WE?

Janelle, Antoinette and  Trisha are the partners behind Jupiter Soundscape LLC. Each of these women bring to the table their own powerful story behind their own self healing and also their unique skill set which makes the Jupiter Soundscape concept so unique.

Janelle is fashion industry veteran of 20 years, who after experiencing many earth shattering pregnancy losses and an infertility diagnosis received the miracle (a child) which set her out on her path to be a lightworker through the modality of sound healing. 

Antoinette, a yoga teacher and former yoga studio owner, is a evidential medium, and shamanic reiki healer doing much pro bono work with cancer patients. 

Patricia, a techie by day and restauranteur by night, is the co founder and owner of many thriving businesses in the LA area and a certified sound healer and movement meditation leader.

All three of us are committed to the practice of healing. There is too much going on in this world in terms of numbing, suppressing, violence, chaos and sickness. If we can have this space to allow people to heal and work through all the things in their lives which they feel they can no longer accept, we know we can create a great ripple effect that will energetically shift our local and global community. This work needs to be accessible to all people. We are committed to doing this work for ourselves, for our families and for everyone that has ever needed a place to go to reconnect with themselves and their inner power once again. 

 

HOW DID WE GET THIS IDEA?

We simply looked around at our community and saw the lack of this type of space and service in areas in our proximity. We felt the disparity in that to obtain these type of services, education or to be in this type of space people in this community were required to travel almost 30 miles away. Our goal is to make these types of practices accessible in our community and give back to the place we grew up in.

Today we need your help in acheiving our goal of $44,444. By contributing to our cause you will be helping us to create an great shift in mind, body and soul for an entire community in the West Covina, Walnut, SGV and IE areas. 

 

WHAT'S THE PLAN?

Our plan is to begin the buildout for our new space at 18756 Amar Rd. as soon as possible but here is a brief timeline of our operation as we see it.

Our Timeline

Following are key activities, many of which will occur concurrently:

Conditional Use Permit Approved – April 2019

Facility Renovation and Construction – May - June 2019

Staff Hiring and Training – June 2019

Soft and Full Launch – July 2019

 

WHERE IS YOUR FUNDING GOING?

Here is a breakdown of our budget.

Initial Buildout - $20,000

RENT/Security Deposit - $6000

Inventory - $5000

Signage - $2000

Class/Studio Equipment - $1000

Insurance - $1500

Employees - $6844

Utilities - $1100

Advertising - $1000

 

SO MANY AMAZING REWARDS!

In return for your generous donation in helping us raise the required amount of  $44,444, We have created these exciting rewards including things like; Being named forever in our healing mandalas, crystal sets, a ticket to our grand opening, or a energy clearing box set!

CLICK HERE FOR A CLOSER LOOK

https://www.jupitersoundscape.com/shop

 

Our Impact

There is no space like this in this area, so with your generous contribution you are bringing the accessibility for education and service of the culmination of many ancient technologies for the purpose of healing.

We are working on setting up a program that allows us to do pro bono work with cancer patients. Many of our parents, loved ones and friends have passed from this disease and you will be helping us to provide an outlet and an alternative to those who may have begun to feel incurable and hopeless. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Many people are still unaware of the benefits of our healing modalities.  But we are committed to providing education surrounding these healing technologies that have been used in ancient cultures for thousands of years. We also have a myriad of practitioners and teachers under our umbrella that have already establlished clientele waiting for a permanent space to call home.  These practitioners and teachers have garnered strong word of mouth referrals as a result of their powerful and effective methods of allowing their clients to realize their inherent wholeness.

Another posed risk is other competitors in the field of yoga, meditation and healing arts facilities. However our strategic location as well as unique approach using wholistic vibration medicine; sound, crystals movement and alternative healing therapies, differentiate our space from other yoga studios, healing arts spaces as well as metaphysical shops.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

We understand that you may not be able to make a financial contribution at this time and that’s ok. It would mean the world to us if you were able to spread the word and get this message out there! We’ve made our campaign and content easy to share! Click on the google drive link below and you will find any and all assets to use to help us #MAKESHIFTHAPPEN.

Hi !

Check out this campaign that I am helping to support. My friends Janelle, Antoinette and Trisha (Jupiter Soundscape LLC) are crowdfunding the start-up cost (buildout, permits, supplies and inventory) of their wellness space set to be in West Covina, CA. This is important because there is nothing like this as of yet in that area or in the surrounding communities. The creation of this space for movement, meditation, sound and energy healing will be so beneficial for those seeking this type of help but who do not live anywhere near where these types of services are available. Any little bit helps and they are offering some amazing rewards for donations ranging from as little as $22 - $4444 !! Please check out the Indiegogo campaign here. And thank you in advance for helping #MAKESHIFTHAPPEN.

 

SHARE OUR STORY WITH THESE TOOLS!

  • content - https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1xpmng3qHnrcmVfhkzttpmgzBomHbq47b?usp=sharing
  • on IG hashtag - #MAKESHIFTHAPPEN #JUPITERSOUNDSCAPE
  • indiegogo link - https://igg.me/at/JUPITERSOUNDSPACE/x/20729890

 

PRESS

  • JANELLE on Sound Healing for Fertility on THE NOW AGE PODCAST with NUMINOUS founder RUBY WARRINGTON https://simplecast.com/s/b0eb1dd4
  • http://voyagela.com/interview/meet-janelle-corpuz-hethcoat-of-jupiter-soundscape/
  • TRISHA in INSTYLE MAGAZINE

story:
Hi, my name is Nish and I've created a natural, FDA compliant solution to end rough mornings after a night out. I have a background in Chemistry and Biology, and have a diverse range of work experience - including Tesla and other engineering firms. The DHM team is a passionate group of scientists (biology/chemistry, geophysics, genetics & biochemistry), athletes, entrepreneurs and productivity seekers.

We've been working on DHM for close to a year and have created a product that is backed by science and optimized to help avoid feeling awful after a night out. DHM was made so you can enjoy your nights and still maximize productivity the next day. Now it's time to share it with the world!

DHM is manufactured in Canada at a leading manufacturer that use CGMP (Current Goods Manufacturing Practices), a facility that adheres to the standards of the FDA and other regulatory bodies internationally! All ingredients undergo extensive testing for safety, purity and stability.

Your Impact

As a backer, you'll be making a huge difference in our lives and will be responsible for helping us achieve our first round of large scale production! Funds raised will be going to production and a small portion will be donated to the Liver Foundation - a group that promotes liver health and balance. We're offering our backers up to 30% off + free shipping, and are excited to get DHM to you! We will do our very best to ship your order out no later than the end of July!

If you can't contribute, that's ok. We would love if you could share our campaign with your friends and family.

 

Testimonials - Check out some of the feedback we've received 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Referral Program - Once you've backed us, you can share your referral link for awesome prizes!  

Follow us on instagram @dhmdetox or on our website at www.dhmdetox.com

The challenge was to create a convenient, healthy, natural solution to fight off hangover symptoms. We spent just under a year on testing, research and development, formulation and collecting feedback. After hundreds of testers and amazing feedback, we're ready to move to commercialize DHM.

Our formula is special because it only contains ingredients that are relevant to getting rid of your hangover. Everything has a purpose and is either a liver protectant, anti-oxidant, anti-inflammatory or replenishes key nutrients lost while drinking. 

Convenience is key. How could we make sure our customers remember to take our product while they're out? We had to make sure that everyone could easily take DHM with them - so that's why they're packaged in easy-to-carry grab and go packets!

We've secured production with a CGMP facility that is recognized and follows the standards of the FDA, Health Canada and other regulatory bodies internationally.

All orders will be shipped with the appropriate tracking information. We are only able to ship to countries that support tracking to ensure you receive your DHM.

story:
What's This About?

From July 11th to July 13th, a group of gods-worshipers are attending a conference in Fishkill, NY where we'll be discussing what precisely we're doing, how to do it better, and more coherently for others.  Gods seem to be flooding back into the world, or we're noticing them more, and the point of this gathering is to figure out what this all means for ourselves, each other, the world, and the gods.

I submitted a proposal and was accepted as a presenter, but I don't yet have a way to get there.  So I'm asking for your help.

What I Need

The costs of traveling to NY from Eugene, Oregon are more than I can manage on my own.  I've been working 25 hours a week at an Italian restaurant, making pizzas in an ancient stone oven for 30 cents above minimum wage (Eugene isn't known for high wages). 

In order to get there and back, I'll need between 750 dollars and 1000 dollars.  More than half of that cost is airfare.  There's no registration fee for the conference, only base costs of lodging (I intend to share a room with someone in order to cut this cost in half).  Incidental costs (train to and from Fishkill from NY city) and food for the three days will also be kept as low as possible.

There's another complication--I can't get the time off from my job in order to go, so I'll need to quit my job.  I may need to leave Eugene and couch surf for a few weeks, becoming itinerant again (a common state lately), but the opportunity to attend this conference far outweighs the weight of my rucksack.

Other Stuff

The presentation I'll be giving can be found here

The information for the conference is here

The amount of money I'm able to raise will affect what I do afterwards.  If I raise enough for the conference and a round-trip ticket (750) I'll return to either Eugene or Seattle and couch surf for a few weeks, living off the hospitality of friends. 

Anything I raise above that would help me set myself up again in either Eugene (a fine and magic-soaked town) or Seattle (a fine and magical but brutally expensive city), getting me back on my feet a little sooner.   This second tier is much less important than the first.

If I raise less?  I'll find a way to the conference regardless, but may find myself stranded in the northeast. : )

Perks?

So, I'm a writer, huh?  Want something written?

For a donation of 100 dollars (which is roughly what I live on weekly), I'll write you a piece of fiction, between 1k-5k words.  A short story, a fairy tale, or even an erotic piece (I don't normally admit this, but I write erotic fiction as gifts for lovers).  Details can be discussed personally, with the only caveat that I'd ask any particularly graphic erotic pieces not be published publicly.

story:
An anonymous donor outside of Indiegogo will double the impact of your gift if you give by May 7. Every dollar you give can have 2 times the impact for children in the US struggling in this crisis.  

 

 

 

30 million children in the United States go to school not only for learning but also for breakfast, lunch and sometimes dinner.

Those same kids are now stuck at home without access to school lunches, books and, in rural America, computers, broadband, or even print outs from schools that can’t afford paper and ink.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

In fiscal year 2018, 87% of all expenditures went to program services.

 

 

 

Save the Children believes every child deserves a future. Since our founding over 100 years ago, we’ve changed the lives of over 1 billion children. In the United States and around the world, we work every day to give children a healthy start in life, the opportunity to learn and protection from harm. When crisis strikes, and children are most vulnerable, we are always among the first to respond and the last to leave.

We ensure children’s unique needs are met and their voices are heard. We deliver lasting results for millions of children, including those hardest to reach. We do whatever it takes for children - every day and in times of crisis -  transforming their lives and the future we share.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term success for crowdfunding campaigns.

story:
Short Summary

ME

My name is Gabby Yates and every week I volunteer at Homeless Prenatal Program teaching Mom and Baby Yoga. I have 20 + years of experience teaching yoga and working with marginalized communities in the United States, Afghanistan, Kosovo and Mali, West Africa. One lesson I learned over and over again, whether working as a project manager or consultant with war torn communities, the homeless or environmental refugees, is that the best way to affect positive change is not only when the solutions come from the communities themselves but also when community members are the key change makers. 

HOMELESS PRENATAL PROJECT

It was with profound joy when I discovered that Homeless Prenatal Program, based in San Francisco and serving over 4,000 homeless families a year, has the same local resource approach to making positive change in the lives of homeless families. And, they have built this into every fiber of their organization by hiring previously homeless staff with the knowledge that homeless communities know their communities best. This unique, paid, year-long program is called the Community Health Worker (CHW) training which builds capacity and trains former clients of HPP to work at HPP or in another community based organization. 

HPP AND ME

Almost four years ago, I began volunteering at HPP teaching Mom and Baby Yoga for mothers who are precarious either as a result of an undocumented status, homelessness, addiction, domestic violence or a combination of these.  The goal of the class is one part practical in that it serves the mothers to help relieve some of the physical aches and pains of mothering , and one part refuge and healing in that it gives them a safe place where they can rest deeply  and allow their nervous system to quiet amidst the daily chaos that they confront in their lives.  The outcomes of this class have been very heartening with dedicated mothers exclaiming that they had more energy than they knew after yoga and that they finally felt like they could relax. 

MY IDEA

Shortly after I began teaching this class I realized that there was much I could not speak to regarding my student's experiences and what brought them to HPP. Even though I had many years of working with at-risk and marginalized communities that was not my own personal background. And, while the intrinsic messages of healing, resilience and transformation had certainly given me the tools to thrive I knew that someone coming from the same predicament and similar scenario that these women did could deepen these healing messages and make them more applicable. That was when I approached HPP with the idea of a 200 hour yoga teacher training that would give HPP staff the opportunity to increases their capacity to transform challenging life experiences and trauma into insight and learning for themselves and the students in their classes. I felt certain after all my years learning from communities about how to make a positive impact that this training would engender change at both the physiological and emotional levels and that those changes would support the work HPP staff do in helping to pull families out of homelessness. 

THE PROJECT

 A 200 HOUR, YOGA TEACHER TRAINING AS PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT FOR HPP STAFF

It was with even more joy when I learned that HPP loved the idea of the yoga teacher training project and that we would embark on this project journey together. With your support and help we will train 15 staff members, many of whom have been through the Community Health Worker program and came from homelessness themselves, and give them the opportunity to formally study yoga and become certified to teach ongoing yoga classes at HPP and in any community in which they find themselves.   The yoga teacher training will be one more tool to address the underlying effects of poverty which they encounter as case workers everyday  by guiding homeless women to self-care resources that support healing and resilience.  

The short term objectives include:

Short Term Outcomes

Upon completion of the 200-hour Teacher Training, graduates will:

  • Have a 200-hour Teacher Training certification, that is Yoga Alliance approved.
  • Have the opportunity to apply to teach yoga at Homeless Prenatal Program
  • Be connected to a mentorship program that links them to a Yoga Instructor in San Francisco who assists them in navigating further employment opportunities.
  • A connection to a Yoga studio, place of employment, school or community center where they have completed their internship requirement.

YOGA WITH A SOCIAL JUSTICE AND PEACEBUILDING LENS

Who has access to yoga and who doesn't? This is a critical question that we in the yoga community must ask ourselves given that some of the key concepts of yoga are liberation and awareness of our shared humanity.  One over-arching objective of this project is to increase inclusion and health equity so that graduates of this program can amplify the voices of marginalized and diverse communities in the dominant and mainstream yoga dialogue and contribute to a model that will serve their communities more directly. 

WHERE THE MONEY WILL GO

Your donations will pay for:

  • props for each student: mat, blocks, bolster, strap and chair
  • books for each student according to the curriculum 
  • rent for the room we will use each month
  • transportation and meals for students
  • fees for yoga, anatomy and philosophy instructors 

Any funds still remaining will be held as stipend for newly minted HPP yoga teachers to teach at HPP.

If you can't financially support this project please talk it up among your friends, post on social media or become an ambassador and start a conversation about who has access to yoga and who doesn't so that wellness is a reality for all of us!

rent for the room we will use each month

story:
Why Your Best Friend Needs To Go Natural

We all have one common objective when it comes to our dogs: to give them the best life we can. At MaxWell Pet, we're trying to do just that with our revolutionary natural formulas. Our proprietary process produces the first and only natural remedies for dogs that combine plant stem-cell therapy, immediately absorbable minerals and tissue stimulation in one safe and effective product. The ingredients used in the formulas have been scientifically tested and clinically proven. (See the bibliography below for references.)

I'm Dr. Stuart Garber and I have been practicing natural medicine for the last 35 years. For decades, I've researched and tested natural health products on my human patients. My mission, my passion, has been to help people live a healthy and happy life without the harmful side effects of drugs. My unique Biotherapy Formulas have produced truly unprecedented results for many of my patients' most pressing health concerns, and have already sold over 100,000 bottles nationwide. 

My passion extends to animals - I have treated all my pets with my formulas, with amazing results. You may not realize it, but many veterinary prescriptions can have the same kinds of side effects as those for humans. For instance, when you bring your dog in for pain management, the doctor might prescribe pills to help the pain...even though the pills cause incontinence. How crazy is that? I decided to create MaxWell Pet to give our dogs the same high quality of care that we give to ourselves.

Based on customer testimonials, I can confidently say that MaxWell Pet remedies are effective natural solutions for common dog ailments - solutions with zero side effects. management, the doctor might prescribe pills to help the pain...even 

See for yourselves what our customers have to say:

 

"Vincent is 10 years old and his painful hips were really slowing him down. With MaxWell Pet Hip & Joint he’s running around like a 2 year old again.​"

Isabel Madley

 

"Maggie Mae is a ten year old Lab who suffers from seasonal allergies. Her itching makes her miserable and robs both her and us of sleep. Doc Stuart's Skin & Allergy formula works. We keep several bottles in the cupboard."

Diane Campbell & Ray Moreau

 

 

Take Hip & Joint For Example...

 

Our intention for the money you contribute is to educate pet parents about the natural alternatives to drugs with harmful side effects. We are a movement of people who love our dogs, and we know that these formulas will help our best friends live a healthy and happy life.

Please become a part of that movement to help all dogs live longer and better. You can share this mission on your favorite social channels and let your friends know in the dog park. Let's make a better dog world together.

Join us by making a contribution now. Thank you!

 

Frequently Asked Questions about MaxWell Pet

Do MaxWell Pet formulas cause any side effects?

There are no known side effects and there have been no reported adverse events as a result of dogs being given any of the formulas. However, you should not give ANY product if your pet has known allergies to any of the ingredients.

I have dogs of different sizes. Do they all get the same amount of MaxWell Pet?

Most dogs will do just fine with 1.0 ml (the dropper is marked) at a time. Very small breeds (Chihuahuas, Yorkies, etc.) can be started at half that amount and very large breeds (Great Danes, Mastiffs, etc.) might require a bit more. The amount and/or frequency can be safely adjusted to suit your dog’s needs.  

Can I give my dog MaxWell Pet while she’s pregnant and lactating?

No adverse reactions have been reported as a result of giving MaxWell Pet during this time. However, while pregnant or lactating, it is advisable to seek the advice of your veterinarian before giving these products.

There’s alcohol in MaxWell Pet. Why?

The alcohol present in MaxWell Pet is a necessary part of the manufacturing process. Some of the active plant-based ingredients used in these formulas are only soluble in alcohol, without which these powerful substances could not be extracted. There are only trace amounts in a single dose and this amount is not harmful to animals. 

Can I give MaxWell Pet if my dog is also taking a prescription drug?

There have been no reported cases of interactions between MaxWell Pet  and prescription drugs. The formulas have been found by many dog owners to be useful while weaning off certain medications. Ask your veterinarian if this might benefit your pet.

Will MaxWell Pet interfere with my pet’s nutritional supplements?

Not only do MaxWell Pet formulas not interfere with nutritional supplements, they actually enhance the utilization of certain minerals and other nutritional substances.

Can more than one formula be given at the same time?

Yes. All of the MaxWell Pet formulas are compatible with each other and will retain their individual effectiveness when given together.

How long will it take to see results?

This will vary from animal to animal. Most respond quickly, often with the first few dose. In other instances, depending on how severe or how long the problem has been going on, it may take several weeks to produce the desired effect.

Will my pet need to take MaxWell Pet forever?

The MaxWell Pet formulas were not developed to mask symptoms but to assist in bringing the body back to a state of health. Once the desired result has been achieved, the formulas may then be taken on an as-needed basis. However, the formulas do act preventatively and you may continue giving your pet MaxWell Pet formulas indefinitely without any harm.

What are the ingredients?

All of the MaxWell Pet formulas contain a combination of three types of ingredients known as biotherapies. The three we use are gemmotherapy, lithotherapy and organotherapy. Gemmotherapy are extracts made from the buds and other actively growing parts of plants that stimulate and optimize cell function much like stem-cell therapy. Lithotherapy are made from mineral-rich rocks that are reduced to a fine powder and bioenergetically enhanced. This allows for immediate absorption and optimization of mineral balance in the cells where they act as catalysts for enzyme reactions. Organotherapy are homeopathic preparations of healthy glands and other tissue. It activates the immune system and restores and balances normal function.

Hip & Joint

A proprietary blend of: Black Currant buds; European Grape Vine buds; Mountain Pine buds; Wild Woodvine young shoots; Orpiment; Quadratic Feldspar; Cartilage extract; Ligament extract.

Skin & Allergy

A proprietary blend of: Black Currant buds; English Elm buds; European Walnut buds; Rye Grain rootlets; Conglomerate; Galena; Dermal extract; Pineal gland extract.

Calm & Happy

A proprietary blend of: Ash Tree buds; Fig Tree buds; Lime Tree buds; Silver Birch seeds; Lepidolite; Tourmaline; Adrenal gland extract; Hypothalamus extract.

 

Biotherapies - Selected Bibliography

Bouko Levy, Michael, MD – Homeopathic and Drainage Repertory. 1992, Editions Similia. Paris, France.

Brennan, Mary L., DVM - The Natural Dog. 1994, Penguin Books, New York, NY, USA.

Brennan, Mary L., DVM - Complete Holistic Care and Healing for Horses. 2001, Trafalgar Square Publishing, North Pomfret, Vermont, USA.

Haflon, Roger, MD - Gemmotherapy: The Science of Healing with Plant Stem Cells. 2005, Healing Arts Press, Rochester, Vermont, USA.

Hamilton, Don, DVM - Homeopathic Care for Cats and Dogs. 1999, North Atlantic Books, Berkeley, California, USA.

Julian, O. A., MD -  Materia Medica of New Homeopathic Remedies. Revised English Edition, 1979, Beaconsfield Publishers, Ltd., Beaconsfield, Bucks, UK.

Muller, Marie-France, MD, ND, PhD - Colloidal Minerals and Trace Elements: How to Restore the Body's Natural Vitality. 2005, Inner Traditions / Bear & Company, Rochester, Vermont, USA.

Rozencwajg, Joe, NMD - Organotherapy, Drainage & Detoxification. 2010, Emryss Publishers, Haarlem, Netherlands. 

Squire, Berklely – Repertory of Homeopathic Nosodes & Sarcodes. 1997, B. Jain Publishers (P) Ltd., New Delhi, India.

Tetau, Max, MD – Gemmotherapy: A Clinical Guide. 1987, Editions Similia. Paris, France.

Vermeulen, Frans – Synoptic Materia Media 2. 1996, Merlijin Publishers, Haarlem, The Netherlands.

campaign_city: Santa Fe, New Mexico, United States

story:
Who We Are:

Daayani Yoga is a pop-up yoga company that was created by Jenna Mannino and Lianna Halko. Our intention behind the company is to create unique yoga events that invite people to look at ALL sides of the human experience, (not just the rainbows and butterflies), to assist in transformation, growth, and change—both on a personal and worldly level. We bring pop-up style all-levels yoga and meditation classes to nontraditional locations, focusing on unity and creativity by including various DIY vendors, artists, and musicians at each event, based on the particular theme of the day.

We are constantly motivated by our genuine love for the yoga practice, and believe that every single person can benefit from yoga, regardless of how it’s presented to them. We’re motivated by the extreme growth that we see in our students at each and every single event. Our students have grown to recognize their own strength through determination, conquer fears that have once held them back, and push past their own self-imposed limitations—and in turn, they take these ideas with them off of the mat, and into society. We also work strongly to make our events affordable, so that more people can attend and experience the lifelong benefits of the practice. We also often donate a percentage of our proceeds at our events to various charities. We believe that this is what makes our company different from regular yoga studios. We have the bigger picture in mind. We want to create change on a much larger scale, and have already seen amazing results from just being up and running for a little over a year! 

While we are grateful for our growth and all of our supporters who have expressed interest in our mission over the past year, we are surely faced with challenges. Not everybody understands our perspective of incorporating all forms of freedom and expression in the yoga practice, and some strongly feel that they do not have anything to do with each other. However, we think that couldn’t be further from the truth. We believe in the importance of yoga off the mat, and into the community. By having events that intertwine a vast variety of peoples passions/interests while still respecting ancient traditions, that we are truly encouraging people to find themselves on a much deeper level.

 

Why This Campaign is Important:

Having our own location will allow us to offer regularly scheduled, smaller scale, & more intimate classes & private lessons. However, what sets us apart from a typical yoga studio is that we're offering much more than just yoga, including but not limited to: community gatherings, group meditations, tarot readings, guest teachers, pot-lucks, book club, collaborations, yoga bar crawls, happy hour playlist yoga, & various specialized workshops. We aim to unite, rather than compete with the wellness community on Long Island.

Although we are just about ready to officially open our doors this September, there's still a lot that we could use your help with! Opening our own space will require a ton of effort, time, and funding to get everything ready for opening day. Every contribution will help us provide a better experience for our students, and help us connect with new people. Contributions from this campaign will go directly towards the purchase of necessities such as yoga props, paint, decor, furniture, compensating our guest teachers, etc. It will also help fund the marketing and advertising that we will need to reach new clientele.

If you are interested in helping us get closer to our goal, you can choose to make a donation of any monetary amount out of the kindness of your heart, OR select from any of our "perks". By selecting a perk, you will receive a yoga membership at a discounted price only available through this campaign. All memberships are effective upon our opening day in early September (date TBD). To see our tentative schedule, visit the FAQ section. *Please keep in mind all membership prices will increase once this campaign ends. Retail prices are listed in each perk description.*

 

Other Ways to Support our Mission Without $

  • Share the link to this campaign on social media
  • Shout us out
  • Like, share, or comment on our posts
  • Send us a good luck message
  • Be nice to us! 

 

Every gesture of support means the world. We hope to see you in class!

Infernally yours,

Jenna & Lianna.
story_txt:
Who We Are:Daayani Yoga is a pop-up yoga company that was created by Jenna Mannino and Lianna Halko. Our intention behind the company is to create unique yoga events that invite people to look at ALL sides of the human experience, (not just the rainbows and butterflies), to assist in transformation, growth, and change—both on a personal and worldly level. We bring pop-up style all-levels yoga and meditation classes to nontraditional locations, focusing on unity and creativity by including various DIY vendors, artists, and musicians at each event, based on the particular theme of the day.We are constantly motivated by our genuine love for the yoga practice, and believe that every single person can benefit from yoga, regardless of how it’s presented to them. We’re motivated by the extreme growth that we see in our students at each and every single event. Our students have grown to recognize their own strength through determination, conquer fears that have once held them back, and push past their own self-imposed limitations—and in turn, they take these ideas with them off of the mat, and into society. We also work strongly to make our events affordable, so that more people can attend and experience the lifelong benefits of the practice. We also often donate a percentage of our proceeds at our events to various charities. We believe that this is what makes our company different from regular yoga studios. We have the bigger picture in mind. We want to create change on a much larger scale, and have already seen amazing results from just being up and running for a little over a year! While we are grateful for our growth and all of our supporters who have expressed interest in our mission over the past year, we are surely faced with challenges. Not everybody understands our perspective of incorporating all forms of freedom and expression in the yoga practice, and some strongly feel that they do not have anything to do with each other. However, we think that couldn’t be further from the truth. We believe in the importance of yoga off the mat, and into the community. By having events that intertwine a vast variety of peoples passions/interests while still respecting ancient traditions, that we are truly encouraging people to find themselves on a much deeper level. Why This Campaign is Important:Having our own location will allow us to offer regularly scheduled, smaller scale, & more intimate classes & private lessons. However, what sets us apart from a typical yoga studio is that we're offering much more than just yoga, including but not limited to: community gatherings, group meditations, tarot readings, guest teachers, pot-lucks, book club, collaborations, yoga bar crawls, happy hour playlist yoga, & various specialized workshops. We aim to unite, rather than compete with the wellness community on Long Island.Although we are just about ready to officially open our doors this September, there's still a lot that we could use your help with! Opening our own space will require a ton of effort, time, and funding to get everything ready for opening day. Every contribution will help us provide a better experience for our students, and help us connect with new people. Contributions from this campaign will go directly towards the purchase of necessities such as yoga props, paint, decor, furniture, compensating our guest teachers, etc. It will also help fund the marketing and advertising that we will need to reach new clientele.If you are interested in helping us get closer to our goal, you can choose to make a donation of any monetary amount out of the kindness of your heart, OR select from any of our "perks". By selecting a perk, you will receive a yoga membership at a discounted price only available through this campaign. All memberships are effective upon our opening day in early September (date TBD). To see our tentative schedule, visit the FAQ section. *Please keep in mind all membership prices will increase once this campaign ends. Retail prices are listed in each perk description.* Other Ways to Support our Mission Without $
Share the link to this campaign on social media
Shout us out
Like, share, or comment on our posts
Send us a good luck message
Be nice to us! 
 Every gesture of support means the world. We hope to see you in class!Infernally yours,Jenna & Lianna.

story:
Having an illness or a disability is stressful. Period. Anyone living with any kind of medical condition inherently faces an array of emotional and psychological challenges. Fear over the future, anger over the loss of independence, frustration over being misunderstood or pitied, anxiety, loneliness, sadness... just to name a few.

 

Stress does profound things to our bodies and minds. Stress negatively impacts the way we value, and therefore care for, ourselves. It impacts our relationships with friends, family, and caretakers. Physically, stress leads to a weakened immune system, cardiovascular system, digestive system, and countless diseases. This could be detrimental to someone already living with a medical condition.

 

Families experience heightened stress, too. Like the stress of caregiving, medical access, and trying to understand the emotions of their loved one. It can be hard to keep it all together... but when family members are stressed they are less available to provide the calming support that can reduce the effects of fear and anxiety for the individual with a disease or disability.

 

We know that it's easy to get caught up in, or commiserate around, these feelings. It’s hard to find calm in the midst of chaos. Because of this, Beyond My Battle™ was formed to help people with diseases and disabilities get to the root of their stress so they can detect, manage, and reduce it.

Beyond My Battle™ is rooted in the concepts of diversity and positivity. Anyone who is living with – or who loves someone living with – any kind of illness or disability can engage in the BMB community and will find our resources useful. This is because the content does not focus on disease/disability-specific issues, but rather it addresses deeper emotional challenges that are the reality for anyone living with a medical condition, no matter what it is.

 

In a single-disease/disability focused organization, support and resources tend to provide condition-specific information such as diagnostic characteristics, doctor referrals, technology advancements, and symptom specifics. While this information serves a purpose, it can also increase fear and can create disease or disability self-identity. As well, countless single-disease/disability support groups exist as places to talk about specific conditions, yet conversations often involve commiseration or comparison because of the opportunity to feed off similar experience. Rather than building camaraderie and empathy, this can lead to more stress and further self-identity.

 

Beyond My Battle™ encourages individuals to break away from the identity of illness and recognize that they are more than their diagnosis. This process involves a shift in focus from negative discussions to positive discussions within the community. It also involves the creation of resources that provide information targeted at helping individuals identify their reactions to stress and develop ways to calm and cultivate more positive responses. Resources will also address the wellbeing of family, friends, and caretakers so that they can provide support in a healthy and sustainable way.

Beyond My Battle™ started out as an online support group open to anyone, anywhere living with (or having a loved one living with) any kind of disease or disability. We will continue to hold this space as a safe, inclusive community. Especially since studies show that peer-facilitators play an important role in support groups – we will focus on keeping the conversations positive and serving as active help providers.

 

Beyond the ongoing support network, BMB is looking to build an expansive resource library, which will be the primary content of www.beyondmybattle.org (psst – this is why we need your help). The resources will represent a collection of internally-developed and externally-sourced educational tools, both for the individual with an illness or disability and for their loved ones. eToolkits, eBooks, online programs, videos from the BMB YouTube channel, book and product reviews, podcasts and more will be featured here – made accessible to anyone, anywhere.

There is so much we want to create to help this important population we care so deeply about and relate so closely to. But we know we need to start small. We’ve established two tiers of goals, and with your help we think we can reach them.

 

GOAL #1:  $13,000

  1. Development and distribution of the BMB Emotional eToolbox – a downloadable resource to help individuals learn various ways to detect, manage, and reduce the stressors of living with a disease/disability. Useful for those living with a condition, and those who have a loved one living with a condition.

  2. Development and distribution of BMB’s first eBook, Recognizing the Emotional Stressors of Your Condition – a downloadable resource designed for individuals with diseases and disabilities. Using this eBook, readers will learn how to distinguish if a behavior is a result of emotional stress and if emotional stress is impacting their relationships and health. The eBook will also provide strategies to help reduce emotional stress in order to live a more happy, healthy, hopeful life.

 

We're not stopping there! Help us crush our first goal so that we can create a second eBook designed specifically for friends, family, and caretakers!

 

GOAL #2:  $19,000

  1. Development and distribution of the BMB Emotional eToolbox – a downloadable resource to learn various ways to detect, manage, and reduce the stressors of living with a disease/disability. Useful for the individual with a condition, and those who have a loved one living with a condition.
  2. Development and distribution of BMB’s first eBook, Recognizing the Emotional Stressors of Your Condition – a downloadable resource designed for individuals with diseases and disabilities. Using this eBook, readers will learn how to distinguish if a behavior is a result of emotional stress and if emotional stress is impacting their relationships and health. The eBook will also provide strategies to help reduce emotional stress in order to live a more happy, healthy, hopeful life.
  3. Development and distribution of the BMB’s second eBook, Becoming a Source of Calm – a downloadable resource for individuals who have a loved one with a disease or disability. Using this eBook, readers will learn how to better understand the emotional stressors of their loved one, and learn ways to become a source of calming, healthy support. This also includes self-care strategies for family members and caregivers – we can’t pour from an empty cup!

GOAL #3:  $24,500

  1. Development and distribution of the BMB Emotional eToolbox – a downloadable resource to learn various ways to detect, manage, and reduce the stressors of living with a disease/disability. Useful for the individual with a condition, and those who have a loved one living with a condition.
  2. Development and distribution of BMB’s first eBook, Recognizing the Emotional Stressors of Your Condition – a downloadable resource designed for individuals with diseases and disabilities. Using this eBook, readers will learn how to distinguish if a behavior is a result of emotional stress and if emotional stress is impacting their relationships and health. The eBook will also provide strategies to help reduce emotional stress in order to live a more happy, healthy, hopeful life.
  3. Development and distribution of the BMB’s second eBook, Becoming a Source of Calm – a downloadable resource for individuals who have a loved one with a disease or disability. Using this eBook, readers will learn how to better understand the emotional stressors of their loved one, and learn ways to become a source of calming, healthy support. This also includes self-care strategies for family members and caregivers – we can’t pour from an empty cup!
  4. Monthly Podcast & Video Series – accessible on various platforms, the BMB Podcast "Beyond Our Battles" will feature a different guest each month. We will talk about different topics related to life with an illness/disability with experts in a variety of fields – everything from nutrition to mental health, spirituality and sport. The podcast will be available to listen and we will also film each episode and post it on our YouTube channel. Both will be part of our growing resource library.

story:
HELP US CREATE A STRONG FOUNDATION FOR A SACRED AND PROFESSIONAL HEALING, GATHERING AND RITUAL SPACE 

IN BERKELEY, CA.

This project is important! This space is greatly needed in our community. Contribute Now to help us grow and blossom!



The Urban Temple

Alternative Healing and Spiritual Center

2812 Telegraph Ave, Berkeley, CA

We are Open and so happy to be serving our Berkeley Community.


:::VIDEO UPDATE:::


 

Our intention is to inspire creativity, community connection and personal growth. We hold a sacred and professional space for the integration of healing and ritual into our culture.


Hi! My name is Elaena Flow. 

I am a Holistic Healer and the founder of The Urban Temple.

        Through my experiences and studies as a Sociologist, Shaman and Holistic Healer I have noticed that people in our society are hungry for authentic connection, deep healing, real magic and community support. In our modern American culture there is a lack of accessibility to spiritual offerings and gatherings that are free of dogma and alternative healing modalities are not fully part of the dominant culture. There are so many powerful modalities and practices to experience and too few places for this evolutionary work to take place.

Flow on Paradigm Shift Radio talking about The Urban Temple and Creating Sacred Spaces::


        The tools for transformation we offer at The Urban Temple are potent, impactful and expand consciousness. Communication tools, energy healing, spiritual counseling, improvised ritual experiences, belief restructuring, sound healing, yoga fusion, shamanic dance… these are all modalities that are based on ancient wisdom mixed with the innovation of modern times. They are highly effective and don’t normally fit into regular wellness centers or yoga studios. By giving these modalities a physical space, we make more space for them in the world and amplify their healing and transformational reach. By creating this Temple we are exemplifying a new paradigm that supports alternative healers and shamanic practices and integrates them into daily life.

         As a Holistic Professional and a Practicing Mystic, I offer a wide variety of teachings and healing modalities, including yoga, holistic nutrition, tantric energy healing, spiritual counseling and shamanic dance. With my wide range of offerings and my shamanic style I found I often don’t totally fit in to traditional yoga studios and wellness centers. This produces a problem for me and other metaphysical teachers and healers. It is hard to find spaces to host our events and sessions, and our community and our practices are fragmented because we don’t have a well-fitting space to hold them. I created The Urban Temple for people like me: metaphysical healers, teachers, ritualists and seekers who want to create more space for their work in the world and share, heal, connect and grow.

         I have held a long time dream and vision of creating alternative healing centers and temples all over the world. Three years ago I ran a community and ritual center out of my house in Oakland for one year, called Mystic Activation Temple. It was amazing to see how many people showed up for our events and classes. There is such a need for spaces to gather in this way. The past three years since then have been rich in education and experience for me, and now The Urban Temple is the next incarnation of my visions manifesting.

         These modalities and experiences we will offer at The Urban Temple are incredibly transformational for the participants and the world. We feel strongly that true planetary healing begins within, and the more we evolve ourselves, the more our world will shift to reflect our inner peace and harmony.


Modalities Offered:

- Kundalini Tantra Dance

-Theta Healing

-Tantric Energy Healing

- Reiki

- Spiritual Counseling

- Holistic Nutrition

- Sound Healing

- Zegg Forum

- Imagination Healing Circle

- Shamanic Journey

- Meditation

-Yoga

- Kundalini Yoga

- Educational and Empowerment Workshops

Plus:

- Community Rituals

- Women's Circles

- Art Shows

- Local Artisan and Crystal Store (Coming Soon!)

- Community Clinic (Donation Based Healing) (Coming Soon!)


...and so much more!!!


Meet Our Team:

Elaena Flow is a Shamanic and Holistic Healer, Counselor and Facilitator. With a BA in Sociology and multiple Holistic and Shamanic trainings and certifications, she has become a powerful and passionate community builder and healer. She has traveled the depths and wide range of human experience and has found that to create a healthy and inspired society we need more deep connection, more access to alternative healing, more non-dogmatic ritual and more consistent, supportive community. Through creating The Urban Temple she is synthesizing her sociological and holistic findings into one space to contribute to the birth of a healthier, happier and more inspired culture. 

Katerina Kan is a loving light worker, shining through as a Reiki II practitioner, psychic medium, Tantrika, dancer and artist. Her healing practice, known as Mercury Reiki, is an energy balancing modality inviting guidance from ancestors, angelic guardians and universal consciousness during a Reiki session. After 5 years of living in Berkeley and studying design at the Academy of Art University, Katerina has become Space Director here at The Urban Temple. She believes that every act of love has a Divine ripple effect across the web of life, and is dedicated to creating a sacred space that will be a container for healing, expression, growth and creativity. She looks forward to welcoming everyone to the Urban Temple.


Our Needs and Your Gifts

We have created a lot already, yet to really make our space feel like a temple and a sanctuary for healing we’ll need a few things. Everything we currently have has been free or donated, and we plan to continue to use re-claimed and donated materials as much as possible and build and sew for ourselves when we can. 

The main things we need are:

Flooring!

The current floor in the space is a rough industrial carpet. This is suitable for yoga and community meetings, but it’s too rough for dancing or easy cleaning. We want to acquire Zebra Mats, which are movable interlocking floor pieces. They have the look of a wood floor, the feel of a dance studio, and are easy to clean. Instead of removing the carpeting and installing new hardwood floors, the Zebra Mats faux-floor will cover the entire interior carpet.

We also plan to acquire soft rugs to cover the floor, allowing the space to easily convert between a dance studio, a classroom and a gathering ground.

Lighting!

The overhead lighting is a generic, harsh fluorescent lighting suspended from our high ceilings. We’ve been using our own softer light fixtures, and never turn on the main lighting. We believe proper lighting is a very important aspect of creating a healing space where people feel comfortable. We want to remove the fluorescent strips and install a large chandelier or similar fixture, which will be refurbished or from a local artist. We’ll get smaller lights for low lighting.

Sound Blocking Curtains!

Mystic Doorway is located on busy Telegraph Ave. This is great for accessibility, but we also get a fair amount of street noise in the space. It is important for us to buffer the sound that comes through the main windows, upper ventilation windows and doorway. We have planned a great way to make soundproof curtains by using two rolls of rubber MLV material, each sized at 25’ x 4’, in combination with heavy fabrics. The MLV is the type of rubber used in professional stage curtains, and we will sew the fabric around it to create large, heavy-duty curtains. 

Shelves, Cubbies & Storage!

The space is a blank canvas – it is a large open rectangle with high ceilings and a restroom. We need to build a storage closet, create a reception area and build cubbies for people to store their belongings.

Yoga Mats and Props, Pillows, Chairs!

We need yoga mats and props for 10 students, 20 pillows for floor seating and chairs for participants who would prefer not to sit on the ground.

Temple Décor and Supplies!

We hope to deepen the integrity of the space with beautiful fabrics, art plants, large crystals and a water fountain. Our space already has some beautiful items in it thank you to the thoughtful gifts and donations from the community. Décor will be final portion of our spending budget.

Website, Graphic Design, Advertising Materials!

We’re proud to have our website up and running, but we will need assistance with branding and advertising. We’ll be working with a graphic designer to create a beautiful logo and color scheme for our center. We will also need a budget for advertising our space and offerings to the community. With your help, we can give this gift to all the right people!

Indiegogo Tax, Processing Tax & Gift Shipping Costs!

Total: $12,800

Our Gifts to You

We have some incredible and creative gifts to offer our contributors!

Including:

Altar Boxes - We are offering three sizes of altar boxes. These will be compiled by the founding Goddesses of The Urban Temple, and each box will be unique. We are offering a travel altar box, a medium and a large box. Each box will have candles, crystals, sage or palo santo, altar cloths and orgonite. The bigger boxes will have more and some added bonuses!! This was Aleksandra’s idea, and she is super excited to head up the altar box making!

Orgonite - We are incredibly blessed to offer two different sizes of hand made orgonite. Two different orgnoite makers, Zachar and Michael, have offered to custom make orgonite for our campaign contributors! We will have smaller pendants and larger desk pieces available as gifts.

Mercury Reiki with Kate - All I can say is she is AMAZING! A truly incredible Shamanic energy healer. This gift is perfect for locals to the Bay or far away. She is offering her Mercury Reiki sessions both in-person and long distance. Distance Reiki is surprisingly effective! If you need some deeeeeeeeeep healing and revitalization, give a contribution and let yourself receive this gift!

Nutrition for Cancer Prevention with Flow - Are you ready to be healthy and happy long into your old age? If we give our bodies the right foods and create a healthy lifestyle, we will function well with vibrant our whole lives. There are very easy ways to prevent cancer and other serious disease. Are you ready for a powerful lifestyle change? With this gift you receive three phone sessions with Holistic Health Counselor Elaena Flow on Nutrition for Cancer Prevention, and your life will never be the same!

Transformational Photography with Aleksandra Dubov - WOW! What a gift! See, feel and know your true beauty through the eyes and lense of Aleks. In a 3 hour sessions she takes participants on a deep journey of self love and helps them access their authentic essence and deep beauty. Then, she photographs it! This package includes 11 edited photos of your experience. This is so much more than a photoshoot.

Shamanic Sound and Energy Healing - Three practitioners. Two hours. You. This is a recipe for profound healing and revitalization! If you want to be cared for in the highest way by three loving healers of multiple modalities, this is the gift for you! We will take you on a sound, massage and energy healing journey like you have never experienced.

Goddess Prayer Painting - Let us show you our appreciation for your contribution by creating a customized and deeply intentional prayer painting with our bodies, our hearts and our souls. This large canvas custom creating painting will be created in a deep ritual of love, peace and healing. We will use our bodies, paint brushes and creative tools to co-create a masterpiece of the moment. We will document our creation process for you and send you the final work of art!

The Impact

With your help we can make a powerful place in the East Bay for alternative and shamanic healing and ritual. We have a goal to create many temples of this kind, both Urban and Nature, and plan to blossom into a non-profit organization that grows from this seed of The Urban Temple.

Contribute now to help bring this vision into reality and create a ripple effect of healing and empowerment worldwide.

Thank you for your support! Stay in touch through our contact form on our website: www.theurbantemple.org. We look forward to growing with you!!

Share this campaign with your facebook friends and other networks to help The Urban Temple come to life!
