WHAT’S THE PURPOSE OF OUR FUNDRAISER?It is to lovingly bring the wise indigenous Grandmothers from around the globe to participate in the Gathering for Humanity in Santa Fe, NM and share their wisdom with humanity. Your contribution will help pay for their travel, food, lodging, and honorariums for sharing their very important wisdom with humanity. Bringing the Grandmothers from different parts of the world to share their powerful knowledge requires financial support. For this reason, we ask that you please generously support this crowdfunding campaign to cover these costs.We honor you and thank you for any cash donation you can make to bring the wise and loving Grandmothers together for this transformational event. Great wisdom emerges when these powerful souls come together in one place. Please open your heart, and bless yourself in the knowing that you are contributing to uplift all of humanity. You are loved, and your love matters. Thank you for your heartfelt contribution to this very important cause at this auspicious time on Mother Earth.WHAT IS THE "GATHERING FOR HUMANITY"? The Gathering for Humanity is powerful and timely 5-day retreat conference for unity and awakening at this pivotal moment on Earth.“While staying at The Chi Center this winter, I was shown that each of us are holding a piece of the puzzle that catapult us in the direction of personal and collective healing, wisdom and harmony. This Gathering at the Chi Center will be an emergence of the Sacred in Form – a catalyst and sanctuary for so many to be saturated in blessings and cosmic energies. “Grandmother Flordemayo​Mayan healer and teacher, founding member of the Council of Thirteen Indigenous Grandmothers WHY IS THE "GATHERING FOR HUMANITY" HAPPENING?A mandate of Spirit through universal healer Mayan Grandmother Flordemayo, the Gathering is an urgent calling to all humanity committed to awakening and moving with love, light, compassion and peace.In this pivotal time on earth, we as elders recognize the inherit need for Humanity to move in a different way. Our habits, what we hold true, how we see our place in nature, with the universe and within our hearts.VISIONGrandmother Flordemayo was shown that each of us is holding a piece of the puzzle that will catapult us in the direction of personal and collective healing, wisdom and harmony. WE ARE CHILDREN OF THE STARSThe conference shares teachings and wisdom from indigenous elders as well as sacred ceremonies honoring the ancient ones, spirit and the invisible realm. Our intention is to create a sacred container for teachings and awakening to be experienced on a personal and deep level.How will each of us experience this awakening? The short answer is we don't know. Each of you will experience it in your own way and it is not our place to say how that may happen for you. You will feel it with all your being. You will feel the remembrance deep within you and awaken on a cellular level.The intention of the Gathering is to help you develop a deeper trust with your truth and to help you integrate and work with true purpose and calling in a deeper way.We hope you can make it and thank you for your contribution in making this gathering happen.FUNDING REQUEST FOR THE GATHERING We are working diligently to create a sacred container for all of us, honoring the ancient ones, the land, all elders, honored guests and all of you coming from near and afar. We recognize that the Great Mystery is just that. That we don't have all the answers, just the choice to surrender within so that we may move with trust. As you can imagine, the expense of co-creating this Gathering has many details and associated costs. We are bringing our Grandmothers and honored guests together from all over the world, including travel from New Zealand, Germany and different parts of the United States. The Gathering for Humanity is a movement … thank you for moving with us with love, light, compassion and peace.Thank you for your help in bringing the Grandmothers and honored guests to Santa Fe, New Mexico in May to share their prayers and message of global alliance/We have a goal to raise $55,000 to help cover the following costs. 
Airfare, meals, lodging, honorariums, transportation for the Grandmothers and Wisdom Keepers
Equipment rentals
Education scholarships for our youth
Scholarships for attendees
Event program & printing costs
Livestream logistics & production 
Insurance 
Safety & Medical
Website, marketing & social
Audio & Visual expenses
Permanent Compassion Dome and other global peace initiatives
If you would prefer to mail a check please make payable to:The Path ICO The Gathering for HumanityPO Box 1163Estancia, NM 87016The Path is a As a 501(c)(3) organization and your donation is tax deductible and you will be sent a donation letter and thank you card.HOSTING ORGANIZATIONS We represent four different organizations, brought together by a mandate from spirit and a common vision to form a new global alliance. Our purpose is an alliance of prayer, wisdom, education, and healing for our Mother Earth – for all her inhabitants, for all children, and for the next seven generations, in the four directions.GATHERING HOSTSGrandmother Flordemayo and The Pathhttp://followthegoldenpath.orgMaster Mingtong Gu and the Chi Centerhttp://www.chicenter.com/chi/retreat/thecenter/Matthew Reifslager and The Wholeness Crystal Earth Projecthttp://crystalearthproject.orgMadi Sato & Timothy McLaughlin and Praising Earthhttp://praisingearth.orgEMERGENCE IN SACRED FORMWe will gather on the sacred land of The Chi Center, in New Mexico. The Star Beings and Ancient Ones are calling us and those who hear the calling will come and experience their truth in their own way that was meant to be. At the Gathering each grandmother, keynote speaker, and honored guest plans to share their culture and tradition of prayer and teachings for future generations. The prayers of the Gathering need to be heard and your financial support can make this happen. If you are unable to make a contribution, we ask for your prayers for the success of the gathering.Additionally, those who can’t make it in physical form can experience some of the teachings and wisdom shared via live-stream. We are doing all we can to share with all of you in the four directions.Our goal is to move in alignment with a movement that started eons ago. A movement of love, light, compassion & peace. We aim to do all we can to co-create this beautiful movement with you beyond the Gathering.We are the ones we’ve been waiting for.We invite all of you to start integrating and celebrating the love within you. The forgiveness within you. The blessings within you. Know that you are a blessing on a journey to wholeness. Know that you are loved and your love matters. We love you and thank you for your contributions. THE COMPASSION DOMETHE VISION OF THE CHI CENTER Support of Energy Practicea place that energetically supports the expansion and integration of all wisdom traditions and wellness modalities, bridging the practical and spiritual, personal and social, inner and outer.A Place of Healing & Transformationa dedicated place for people to learn and practice self-care, self-healing and self-empowering through Wisdom traditions.Empowerment of Professionalsa place for leaders and teachers of all wisdom traditions, health and wellness organizations, and other professional communities to nourish and refresh their own bodies, hearts, and minds.A Portal for Global Communitya physical portal for connecting people globally, through state of the art communication technologies and wisdom practices dedicated to healing of ourselves and healing of our world.Manifestation of a future visionStarting with this gathering for humanity in May 2018, we envision and committed to create this dome for 500+ people to host all future “Gathering for Humanity” with world indigenous grandmothers, worldwide ancient and contemporary wisdom keepers, musician and artists, visionary leaders, young generations as well as elders. One vision is to showcase the artistic and spiritual vision of the sacred earth and mystery of the universe through high tech presentation.Are you ready to help us to manifest it right here and right now, for many generations to experience this landmark Gathering for Humanity? RECONNECTING HUMANITY WITH OUR PLANET, EACH OTHER AND THE COSMOS THROUGH GLOBAL CRYSTAL SEED PLANTINGSIndigenous traditions universally honor Mother Earth as the great being whose energies heal and awaken humankind. The Crystal Earth Project engages and amplifies these powerful energies for our personal and collective transformation. The project is supporting people from diverse spiritual traditions in planting Crystal Earth Seeds in sacred lands around the world. Planted 2-3 feet below the ground, Crystal Earth Seeds connect into our planet’s existing crystalline grid, amplifying higher evolutionary energies to help humanity’s healing and awakening. Already Seeds have been enshrined in some of our planet’s most potent energetic points, including the Himalayas in Nepal, the Peruvian Andes, Mt. Haleakala, the Canadian Rockies, Mt. Shasta, Mt. Carmel Israel, Australia’s Mt. Warning, and many other places of global significance.Join this global initiative to help reconnect humanity with the higher evolutionary Earth and cosmic frequencies now available to us. Upcoming “Gathering for Humanity” retreat :May 16-20, 2018:www.gatheringforhumanity.orgOn behalf of Grandmother Flordemayo, Master Mingtong Gu, Matthew Reifslager, Madi Sato and Timothy McLaughlin, we thank you. May you be blessed with love & light. HOSTING ORGANIZATIONS & HONORED GUESTSGATHERING HOSTSGrandmother Flordemayo and The PathMaster Mingtong Gu and the Chi CenterMatthew Reifslager and The Wholeness Crystal Earth ProjectMadi Sato & Timothy McLaughlin and Praising EarthHONORED GUESTSUnci Rita Long Visitor Holy Dance – Oglala Lakota“Our people know that the land and the language are one. If we lose one or the other we are no longer who we say we are.”Unci means Grandmother in Lakota. Unci Rita Long Visitor Holy Dance is Oglala Lakota and was born in the southwestern corner of the Pine Ridge Indian Reservation, South Dakota. She still lives on the land that was allotted to her great grandparents over 100 years ago. Unci Rita cherishes and advocates her traditional Lakota ways and language, which she speaks fluently. Unci Rita is empathetic to single parents and their struggles to raise their children, because she too raised her children (and five of her oldest grandchildren) on her own.Unci Rita is skilled in survival and holds the knowledge of how to dry food and make clothing, both traditional Lakota style and contemporary. Today Unci Rita is a grandmother, great grandmother and great-great grandmother. Unci Rita feels that being part of the grandmothers’ council feels like family, like blood relation, like the other grandmothers feel like her sisters. Unci Rita said the most important job the grandmothers’ council has is to keep all the people in a straight line, “no matter what denomination or color they are”.Grandmother Pershile (Perci) – Hopi/TewaI a member of the Hopi/Tewa Tribe, from the Village of Walpi, AZ. I am a Grandmother who is dedicated to healing hearts, minds and spirits of those that are experiencing pain,educating those who are eager to learn, guiding those who have taken the wrong road, reminding those who forgot the message. I am a wisdom gatherer and a protector of ancient wisdom. I stand in support of all Grandmothers from a variety of ethnicities and religious traditions.As a Hopi Elder, I believe in the Hopi prophecy, “When the Grandmothers speak, the world will began to heal.” I am creating awareness to heal the isolation and separation between people of all nations by sharing my beliefs, stories and history. I go where I am called and rely on the generosity of people to support my work. My most recent work has been with: Patina Wellness Center, Pasqual Yaqui Youth Group, Unity Community Church, Phoenix Indian Center, Native American Urban Ministry, and the Partnership with Native Americans. Most of my personal work has been with community members who are suffering a life threatening and life altering events. Helping and assisting people to deal with pain. Grandmother SaSa – Abenaki/Dawn land peopleI was born in Central Maine to a father of Abenaki/Scottish/Irish descent and a Japanese mother.While growing up, I realized the gifts that I was born with were to be a seer, a dreamer and a hands-on healer. I knew one day that I would meet the Grandmother with whom I was always having spirit conversations in dream-time. The day finally came when I met Grandmother Nakai Breen (Rose of the River), a Cherokee medicine woman in Texas. I spent 20 years with her, learning how to remember the things I already knew and receiving new teachings. When we first met, she asked me, “Where have you been for so long? It took you long enough to get here!”Grandmother Nakai Breen walked as a “Beloved Woman of the People.” She taught me to search and practice the gifts that I was born with and use today at The Rose and The Swan Healing Center to help “Heal the Healers” – the manifestation of a vision I saw in my dreams. The vision Grandmother Nakai and I had led to building the Healing Center we have today located on the Bear Camp River in West Ossipee, New Hampshire.The Rose and The Swan is operated by donation only. No one would ever be turned away. As a Universal Healer, I hold a Medicine Hoop of Life Ceremony twice a year at The Rose and The Swan that was passed on from Grandmother Nakai. This is held the first Saturday of every June and October. My husband of 47 years and I, along with my two helpers, also conduct sweat lodges, pipe ceremonies, and the teach traditional beadwork.Grandmother Nakai also introduced me to the The Crystal Earth Project – a project of helping to plant Crystal Earth Seeds. I have blessed and planted a Crystal Earth Seed in Texas in honor of Grandmother Nakai, blessed the planting of the “Onondaga Peacemaker” Crystal Earth Seed in Syracuse, N.Y. in the Spring of 2016, and planted a Crystal Earth Seed in ceremony at the Medicine Hoop of Life that I keep. This technology directly engages the energies of Mother Earth, through the use of special crystals, for the purpose of healing and enlightening the human physiology.In addition to The Rose and The Swan Healing Center, I currently work with gifted children and adults with brain trauma. At The Rose and The Swan, I also do individual and group counseling. I travel across the United States and Canada to share the Teachings, conduct Sacred Ceremonies and assist with healing when asked.I am a lifelong lover of the earth and its people. My husband Terry and I are blessed with two daughters and four grandchildren. Terry and I have been married for 47 years. Before opening The Rose and The Swan, I formerly served as a National Accredited Flower Show judge and worked as head designer for a major Southern florist for many years. I also served as volunteer for Hospice. Grandmother Moetu Taiha – Maori Tuhoe ElderMoetu-Taiha is descended from Ngai Tauhoe and the Kahungunu Tribes of Aoteara, New Zealand. Moetu-Taiha, in light language means, “I stand for my dreams and in my power.” Moetu derives from two family lines of healers and leaders of the tribe of Tuhoe. Her knowledge has been handed down to her by several Maori Tohungas [Shamans] and acknowledged elders of her tribe. Moetu has spiritual access to information that only a few people can access. Growing up with her special gifts and being taught the art of healing through love since childhood Moetu has traveled the world for 16 years. Moetu’s professional portfolio holds a wealth of knowledge and her specialty in working with cellular system. This method helps to transform trauma by identifying and releasing memories and scar tissue and replacing them with new patterns that empower. I work on the Physical, Mental, Emotional, Spiritual and Etheric layers, supporting you to access your “KNOWING.” Go on a journey for self-empowerment to discover your Truth, your Wisdom, as she helps you uncover the Beacon of Love and Light that you are. Moetu’s expertise is providing Transformational Workshops that provide a framework for inner exploration and empowerment by bridging the gap between spirituality, rationality, and emotions. The workshops are carefully tailored and delivered to assist people from all walks of life in conscious co-creators in all aspects of their existence, whether personal or professional. Moetu’s focus has been around MANA-WA-ORA translated means Heart Power = Light Dimension = Wholistic Radiance. Our bodies are mirrors of our inter- personal – our Spiritual, Mental, Physical, Emotional and Etheric, also our Professional, Sexual, Creative, Financial and Environmental Health. It’s our relationship with all that WE are, which includes partners, family and friends. This is Holistic Health in its entirety. DIMENSIONAL LIGHT FROM THE POWER OF THE HEART RADIATING HOLISTIC WELL-BEING.Accomplishments Speaker/Facilitator at the Benediktush of Centre Germany 2016 – 2017March of the Women for Peace, Belin with Yael Deckelbaum 2017Omega Institute, Rhineback, New York, USA – September 2016, September 2017 Grandmothers of the Sacred WE Gathering, Michigan, USA 2017Elders Gathering with Angaangaq, Greenland 2017World Climate March Opening Prayer Speaker, New York City, USA 2016 Global Indigeneous Grandmothers of the Sacred WE 2012 – 2017 Reverend Grandmother Eila Paul – Maori Tainue ElderGrandmother Reverend Eila Paul is a healer with a spiritual and physical connection to her people, the Maori of Aotearoa New Zealand and to our world culture. Eila works with the elderly and children, using sacred sound as a tool to heal and transform space within people and the environment. She has traveled through North America and Europe offering sacred seeds of knowledge and healing. Eila’s philosophy is that path of Love, Harmony and Beauty. Her singing and music transform life. She is from New Zealand and is a Maori Tainue Elder, member of Grandmothers Circle the Earth, Aotearoa, healer, storyteller, songleader, and dreamweaver. MUSICAL GUESTSJoanne ShenandoahLeah ShenandoahMz. ImaniGeri LittlejohnRick ‘Thunder’ Bastine – Music as MedicineWalking Star – Music as Medicine GRANDMOTHER FLORDEMAYO™Flordemayo® is a Curandera Espiritu, or a healer of divine spirit. As a seer, she has the ability to see other realms of color, light, and sound. In addition, she has the ability to see the effects of existing imbalances on the physical, emotional and spiritual realms within a person’s energy system. She was born in highlands of Central America, specifically Nicaragua and was the youngest of 15 children. In the Mayan astrology she has the seed sign.As a world traveler she has offered ceremonies and has spoken on a wide range of topics from healing with the use of herbs to her more recent project, The Seed Temple, located in Estancia, New Mexico. Flordemayo® travels the globe to share her healings, prayers, and to foster a more spiritual understanding among humanity. She is a founding member of the the Confederation of Indigenous Elders of the America (1995 – 2000), Institute of Natural and Traditional Knowledge (2003 – 2007), Church of the Spiritual Path (1998, 2008 – 2014), and the International Council of Thirteen Indigenous Grandmothers (2004 – 2014).In addition, she is the founder and member of The Path. Born under the sign of Q’anil (seed), Flordemayo® sees her role as cosmic germinator through teaching, community, manifestation and development. In recent years, she began to explore in-depth the wisdom of the seeds. As a caretaker of seeds, she prays for their well-being and survival.In 2012, Flordemayo® received a vision during dialogue with the Beloved Mother. In this vision, Flordemayo® finds herself sitting in a rocking chair, rocking back and forth while being lovingly guided to prepare seed bundles with prayer. The Beloved Mother had shown a cosmic inspiration for Flordemayo® to birth, The Path, an organization dedicated to the conservation and preservation of heirloom and heritage seeds. Now, The Path, prepares seed bundles to be given to the parents of babies being born today and those to be born in the future in the dream of honoring and protecting light beings of all forms in this new era of the Divine Feminine.THE PATHOUR MISSIONThe mission of The Path is to conserve and distribute seeds for future generations. We meet our mission through seed conservation, education, and collaboration with other organizations.OUR VISIONIs to raise spiritual consciousness on the inter-connectiveness between humanity and Mother Earth.The Path is housed on a 40-acre piece of property in Estancia, New Mexico, just east of Albuquerque, New Mexico. Estancia is translated as the “place of rest.” On the 40-Acres are Flordemayo’s five sacred temples for humanity: The Temple of the Golden Child, The Water Temple, The Fire Temple, The Seed Temple, and The Earth Temple.Message from Greg Schoen -  Seed Keeper at The PathThe Seed Temple is the realization of Grandmother Flordemayo's original vision of a place where the sacred heritage seeds would be protected for future generations.  It has existed since 2012 on 40 acres near Estancia, New Mexico and has served as a source of seed for the local area, such as the Estancia Seed Library, as well as for many individuals in New Mexico and elsewhere.   The many gatherings on the site have involved educational classes, sharing of seeds, and celebration of the spirituality carried in the seeds.Now more than ever it is important that we protect and increase our heritage seeds for the future and for our communities.  Much of the diversity of seeds is being lost as fewer people are planting the original seeds, as modern agriculture has turned to genetically modified and patented seed to produce our crops.The seeds in our collection have come from numerous donations of samples of traditional varieties of corn, beans, squash, grains, vegetables, and herbs.   The Seed Temple is designed as a controlled environment that protects the viability of the seeds stored.  From the Seed Temple, many kinds of seeds from our collection have been sent to volunteers who have helped grow and increase them, to keep them strong and to provide a stock source to distribute to others.  Working to preserve these seeds gives us a sense of purpose and unity and fosters the relationships in community which are our true wealth.  The Seed Temple networks with other organizations such as the Rocky Mountain Seed Alliance and with seed preservation groups and individuals in the Southwest and beyond.   It holds a special place in the future of the worldwide movement to preserve our sacred seeds.~Greg Schoen~MASTER MINGTONGMingtong Gu is an internationally recognized teacher and healer who received his training from a variety of Grandmasters in China and at the world’s largest Qigong hospital. This “medicine-less” hospital, Zhineng Qigong Center, has treated over 200,000 patients, with over 185 different illnesses, and with a 95% effective improvement rate. He is the founder of The Chi Center and Wisdom Healing Foundation and has taught Qigong to thousands of people in the USA, China, and Europe.As a child growing up in China during the Cultural Revolution, Master Gu learned much patience and endurance. The youngest of 7 children, he was adopted by a new family, then returned to his birth family at age 7. His family often went without food for days. Despite such hardships, his mother was determined by any possible means to support his dream of education. He became the first from his village to attend college. He earned his BA in Math from Hangzhou University and an MA in Math from University of California at San Diego. He continued his training at Brandeis and Harvard University until deciding to pursue an artist’s career. He earned an MFA from Ohio State University and taught at Columbus College of Art and Design.As a graduate student in Art, Master Gu discovered the treasures of his own culture through the spiritual iconography of Hinduism, Buddhism, Taoism and Western mystic traditions. He also practiced Yoga, Tantric Buddhism, and Qigong. In 1997 he returned to China for Qigong training under Dr. Pang Ming, a Qigong Grandmaster trained in western medicine and traditional Chinese medicine. Dr. Pang synthesizes his profound medical knowledge of the old and new healing sciences into the ancient qigong practice and presents this integrative system of self-healing and cultivation for the present pragmatic world. In the 1980s, he founded the world’s largest medicine-less hospital known as “Huaxia Zhineng Qigong Training and Recovery Center”. Through enormous scientific research (3000 research papers were published during the 90’s), and more than 20 years of experimenting with Qigong healing, Wisdom Healing Qigong has developed into a scientific system of working with energy to improve life, including healing.Master Gu observed thousands of cases of chronic and “incurable” diseases being healed at the Zhineng Medicineless Hospital. Witnessing these profound healing experiences inspired his dedication to the teaching and practice of Qigong healing. Through this practice, he recovered from his own chronic conditions of asthma, scoliosis, back pain and kidney weakness. And in working with his students he found his life passion, purpose, and fulfillment in this union of spiritual practice and applied healing wisdom.He lives and teaches with his wife Linling who is also a gifted teacher and healer, and their two children whom they call their “grandmasters.” In 2008 he and his family moved to the San Francisco Bay area. And in 2016 they relocated to Santa Fe, New Mexico to open The Center for Wisdom Healing Qigong.Since his return from China, Master Gu has trained and helped thousands of students through the Wisdom Healing Qigong™ program. His teaching and healing energy have attracted hundreds to his online courses, weekend workshops, and weekly classes—including programs at Spirit Rock Meditation Center, California Institute of Integral Studies, Esalen Institute, Omega Institute and many other places around the world.Master Gu offers a 28-day intensive healing retreat especially applicable for advanced stages of illness which is modeled after a similar program in the “medicine-less” Qigong hospital in China. His personal healing journey, along with the quality of his joyful loving nature, depth, and healing gifts, have inspired many in the healthcare and spiritual communities.Master Gu’s teaching emphasizes activating the power of inner self-healing which facilitates the release of chronic illness while improving health and well-being. Deep awakening and transformation typically arise in this process of healing. Wisdom Healing™ Qigong integrates many forms of traditional Qigong with Eastern and Western medicine. It is a concentrated and powerful system engaging all levels of physical, mental, emotional, and soulful healing.Through posture, movement, breath and mental concentration, Qigong offers a methodology to rediscover the inner medicine – chi, the vital and healing resource within us – and to magnify the exchange between ourselves and nature, enabling us to fuse with the infinite creative power of the universe that ultimately is the origin of love, compassion, and the source of all healing. MATTHEW REIFSLAGERMatthew is a spiritual healer and teacher. He utilizes celestial and multidimensional energies to help people with illness and life challenges. His work also supports spiritual growth, emotional freedom, and development of full human potential. Matthew founded The Wholeness Crystal Earth Project after receiving insight and guidance into a powerful crystalline technology that can support humanity’s rise to new heights of evolution.Matthew is a spiritual healer who works with celestial and multidimensional energies. Matthew offers support for illness and life challenges. His work also supports spiritual growth, emotional freedom and development of full human potential.Matthew utilizes distinct transformational energies in his work. These energies are a part of the universe and can facilitate healing for the mind, body and emotions. He also provides practical insights on:  
The human experience, including our thoughts, emotions, and beliefs
The energetic cause of certain diseases
Self-healing practices for engaging hidden principles of energy flow in the body
The Earth’s vibrational awakening and how it affects personal evolution
The multi-dimensional universe and humanity’s connection with ascended Masters, Archangels, and other higher consciousness
The relationship of higher states of consciousness with physical and emotional health
Over the last decade, Matthew has seen clients experience significant and sustained benefits from the transformational energies he works with.Although his work is spiritual in nature, it provides practical and profound benefits in life — healing from illness and disease, awakening to inner light and power, overcoming the triggers of fear and suffering, and transforming relationships to self and others.Matthew has multidimensional and energetic perception of the human physiology. His methods of healing come from spiritual activations and awakenings in consciousness.Matthew was blessed with mentors who recognized his potential as a healer and supported his education. In addition to his ability to perceive and engage the energetic pathways of the body, Matthew has training and extensive knowledge of the human physiology, including its structural, systemic and environmental makeup. The Wholeness Crystal Earth ProjectThe Wholeness Crystal Earth Project is honored to support the first Gathering for Humanity. Our mission is to serve humanity’s full healing and spiritual awakening. We are helping reweave our connection with ourselves, with each other, with our planet and with the cosmos.Indigenous traditions universally honor Mother Earth as the great being whose energies heal and awaken humankind. Our project uses a crystalline technology of peace to engage and amplify these powerful energies for our personal and collective transformation.We are working to inspire the planting of thousands of Crystal Earth Seeds in sacred lands around the world. Already Crystal Seeds have been planted in the Himalayas in Nepal, the Peruvian Andes, the Canadian Rockies, Mt. Carmel, Israel, Mt. Haleakala, Maui, Mt. Warning in Australia, and many other places of personal and global significance.Crystal Earth Seeds are designed to amplify, connect and radiate Earth energy for the benefit of humanity. The goal of this initiative is to align our collective awareness with the higher vibrational frequencies of Mother Earth.The Crystal Earth Project is an initiative of The Wholeness 501c3 non-profit organization.MADI SATOMadi Sato is a singer, community leader, and ceremonialist of Japanese Ainu and Celtic roots. She is devoted to raising women’s voices for the benefit of our Earth Mother and her sacred Waters.Madi and her husband, oral poet Timothy P. McLaughlin, are the co-founders of PRAISING EARTH, an organization devoted to reestablishing oral traditions of song, poetry, and story to enliven all people’s essential belonging to Earth. She is the creative mother of the organization’s Singing Waters programs, which include Song Carriers Women’s Circles, Basket of Seeds Grandmother’s Alliance, Song Carriers Immersion Training, and 13 Moons Song Archive.Madi’s deep connection to nature was formed as a child when she lived with her family in the forest and began creating songs in response to the sounds and presences surrounding her. From a young age, she was immersed in indigenous ceremony and drawn to the feet of grandmothers of prayer. She continues to compose original songs & chants consonant with nature’s music and is currently forming an indigenous song archive with an honored group of prominent traditional Song Carriers from around the world.Madi had a twenty-year career as a performing artist, in which she created three albums and won numerous music awards, including being named one of New Mexico’s top performers. She is trained in  singing Shigin (traditional Japanese chanted poetry), certified in the Yoga of the Voice method and completed the Gettin’ Higher Community Choir Leadership Training. Madi is also a lifelong dancer versed in an array of traditions and styles, both old and new. She currently guides women’s water ceremonies and dances, leads workshops & retreats, and offers concerts. She follows a Lakota spiritual path with her husband and their three children, Anjamora, Tadhg & Fiadh.Madi is honored to be invited by Grandmother Flordemayo to hold a prayerful space at the Gathering for Humanity and to serve as one of the hosts as well as a speaker and singer.“I believe the Gathering will draw many people from all walks of life into a safe and vibrant space to receive wisdom from the Grandmothers and the spirits that will awaken our hearts and align us with the greater purpose of humanity to serve and heal the Earth Mother and all earthly life!” -Madi SatoTIMOTHY McLAUGHLIINTimothy P. McLaughlin is an oral poet, storyteller, and ceremonialist. He served many years in native education and founded an indigenous youth spoken word program that was featured in the New York Times and on the PBS NewsHour. He is the editor of the award-winning anthology Walking on Earth & Touching the Sky and the producer of a poetry album and documentary film both titled Moccasins & Microphones. Through his relationships with native peoples, he has followed a Lakota spiritual path since early manhood and his life is rooted in indigenous ceremony and the tending of sacred fireplaces. As a poet, much of his creative work is done in the wild. He is the author of the poetry collection, Rooted & Risen, and his second book of poems is due for release in 2019. McLaughlin is best known for his powerful style of embodied recitation and is committed to creatively reestablishing the more ancient role of the poet as an ecstatic voice of wonder, praise, and challenge in close communication with the natural world. He and his wife, singer Madi Sato, are co-founders of PRAISING EARTH, an organization devoted to re-rooting oral traditions as an essential aspect of the human response to the environmental crisis. McLaughlin directs the organization’s Speaking Fires programs, which include men’s work anchored in ceremony and keeping sacred fires along with a rewilding language project that models and promotes a mytho-poetic way with the Word meant to bolster our collective efforts to lovingly steward the complete wild ecology. PRAISING EARTHRe-Rooting Oral Traditions          MISSIONPRAISING EARTH works to reestablish the oral traditions of song, poetry & story to enliven all peoples’ essential belonging to Earth and inspire our collective stewardship of the complete wild ecology.VISIONPraise is the natural human response to earthly wonder, from the shimmering expanse of blue sky to the delicate faces of red wildflowers. It is the most sublime and powerful employment of our voice as it gathers up and then offers out all our joy, all our longing, even all our grief. As deep, richly-formed praise, our expressions become like food gifted to Earth Mother in reciprocity for her constant nourishment of us. Through engaging with vocal traditions re-rooted in their original sacred context, an ancient knowing rises in us and we reawaken to our basic indigenousness, as sons & daughters of Earth. This opens a vast network of relationship, close kinship with fellow men & women, with the elements, with animals, plants, minerals, and more; friendships that are playful and tender as well as fundamentally binding, true to the interplay of energies that activates and sustains all earthly life. Particularly in the environmental imperative of this age, if we orient our hearts toward a perspective and practice of praise of the earthly, our hands can become aligned with and ready for the necessary work on behalf of the great ongoing ecology.GATHERING HOSTSGrandmother Flordemayo and The PathMaster Mingtong Gu and the Chi CenterMatthew Reifslager and The Wholeness Crystal Earth ProjectMadi Sato & Timothy McLaughlin and Praising EarthHONORED GUESTSUnci Rita Long Visitor Holy Dance – Oglala LakotaGrandmother Pershile (Perci) – Hopi/TewaGrandmother SaSa – Abenaki/Dawn land peopleGrandmother Moetu Taiha – Maori Tuhoe ElderReverand Grandmother Eila Paul – Maori Tainue ElderMUSICAL GUESTSJoanne and Leah ShenandoahMz. ImaniGeri LittlejohnRick ‘Thunder’ Bastine – Music as MedicineWalking Star – Music as Medicine

story:
Who I am:

I am the founder and facilitator of Inceptional Soul Services, an independent energy healing and spiritual counseling service that assists individuals to become empowered as agents of change in their own journey of health and well-being. 

www.inceptionalsoul.com

What I am seeking and Why:

I am seeking to raise $4500 to purchase a Spirit Box so that I can make this healing tool available to anyone in Lindsay and the City of Kawartha Lakes who has the desire to connect with their Essential Self and realize their brilliance as a Divine Spark of cosmic intelligence.

Breakdown of cost: Individually crafted Spirit Box $3300, video projector required for the audio/visual aspects costs approx. $500, and then approx. $400 for shipping costs). Additional funds will cover the added costs of taxes and misc. expenses.

The Spirit Box is a living art form; a leap forward in multi-dimensional quantum healing that utilizes light, sound, color, and the representation of the Divine Feminine (Kwan Yin) to connect deeply with the individual psyche to bring healing and integration of body, mind, and soul.

The actual Spirit Box is 5ft to 6ft tall by 30 inches wide and 3 inches deep. When clients stand before it, they are immersed in the vibrational healing of light, sound, and essence.

Created by Andre Ferrella, the Spirit Box serves as a portal for the intelligence of the cosmos to be expressed in such a way as to reach the individual receiving the experience before them. Even those who are wary of such healing or who struggle with connecting with meditative processes will achieve a healing result from the experience of The Spirit Box.

http://www.andreferrella.com/#!the-spirit-box/c9yk

Here’s what people are saying about their experiences with The Spirit Box: (all images, video and information about the Spirit Box are shared with direct permission from the artist Andre Ferrella)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ojwKxEOTX3E

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Pn4UMM5c40

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TScAQ_xx8e0

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Spdxj5XN_0o

My goal is to make such healing accessible to the general population, and to do so at a very affordable rate. The only obstacle for me in making this happen is the initial purchase expenses. That is why I am asking for your support through this campaign.

With the Spirit Box, I envision setting up presentations for non-profit events as well as offering individual healing sessions incorporating my work with Inceptional Soul Services. In particular I wish to work with and support:

- those who have disconnected from authentic power

- those facing death either through the normal aging process or through terminal illness who have fears and unanswered questions about the soul journey

- those who are grieving for loved ones

- those who have been traumatized in some way as to have blocked their ability to express the truth of their soul essence.

Here's a little bit of history to help you understand this goal:

For the past decade or more, I have been strongly guided by a vision for developing a space that sets the stage for humanity to develop a greater conscious awareness of our inter-relation with ourselves and our planet. Over the years, this vision has been somewhat like a kaleidoscope, various aspects of it transforming in response to deeper wisdom and awareness. At the heart of this vision, however, is the constant flame of Spirit urging me deeper into the unifying consciousness that we are all Divine Essence and that the true healing path is towards remembering that Divine Spark.

...Imagine a space that is a coming together of the Story Tellers, the Gate Keepers, the Light Workers, and all those teachers/ students (a.k.a every human being) who have been building the foundations of a better world for humanity.  It is a coming together for one purpose, to amplify and resonate in the healing power of the heartspace of humanity, coupled with the heartspace of mother earth and anchored in the heartspace of the cosmos. It is a true expression of the fullness of who we are as humans, allowing the expression of our souls through the harmonious energies of the universe and infinite pool of Spirit.

It now occurs to me that the vision isn't so much about a physical place to be created but rather a 'space' of awareness within every individual to remember who we really are as Divine Sparks of universal oneness and multi-dimensional light.

"Andre Ferrella has combined both genius and magic in the creation of his Spirit Box artistic works. Living breathing presentations take form that can transport the viewer in new worlds of perception and being. This may be the closest experience yet offered of a contact of intelligence and light from other dimensions". Dr. Todd Ovokaitys

For years, I have been experiencing visions in meditations and channelling energies that I could not translate in any way that adequately described to others the level of healing that is possible when we allow ourselves to simply be present in these vibrations of color and light and sound. This Spirit Box successfully bridges the energies of Divine creation in such a way as to offer a tangeible visual experience for everyone to witness the power of this energetic healing, even if they are not good at meditating or visualizing. The Spirit Box supercedes the ego perceptions and allows the participant to enter into a space of complete openness and readiness to make the necessary connections for deep transformation and healing.

Other ways you can help:

Think about this: you donate $1 or $2, (which doesn’t even come close to the cost of parking your car for ½ hour to run an errand in the city). You then share with 5 of your friends to do the same. That first stage has already raised $22. If each of your 5 friends then did the same, we have raised over $100 in just two simple steps. It increases exponentially with every share at a mere $1 - $2 donation.

That is affordable for everyone!

If you do not feel the urge to donate financially, then you can still help by sharing this campaign with your friends and family. Tell everyone and anyone about this project and start a conversation about the potential for such a project.

Remember to use the indiegogo share tools

Perhaps you have ideas or suggestions that I can utilize to help support a healing process in other ways.

All funds raised will be put towards the Spirit Box project.

Contact me directly to share your ideas and thoughts: nancy@inceptionalsoul.com
